mi spyad pa'o/ /ma lta bu'i bya ba'i phung po zhes bya ba'i phung po gsum pa rdzogs te/ ma lta bu rdzogs so// // btsun pa 'dul ba'i lus gang lags/ dmigs pa gang lags/ byin gyis brlabs pa gang lags/

mtshan nyid gang lags/ gleng gzhi gang lags/ ngo bo nyid gang lags/ 'bras bu gang lags/ u pA li 'dul ba'i lus ni dmigs pa'o/ /dmigs pa ni nan tan no/ /byin gyis brlab pa ni lus dang ngag dang yid do/ /
mtshan nyid ni las so/ /gleng gzhi ni bsgrags pa'o/ /ngo bo nyid ni nyes pa'o/ /'bras bu ni mtho ris dang thar pa'o/ /'dul ba gzhung dam pa rdzogs te/ u pA lis kun dris pa rdzogs s+ho// //

thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'dul ba gzhung ni dam pa 'di/ /'phags pa nye ba 'khor gyis ni/ /ma 'ongs pa yi gang zag gi/ ma rtogs la sogs bsal ba'i phyir/ /gzhi dang rnam 'byed la sogs kyi/ /'grel

bshad nges pa don gyi lung / /zhus nas rgyal bas bka' stsal to/ /de dag rnams kyang gang zhe na/ /spyi'i sdom la/ zhu ba 'dul byed gcig las 'phros/ /lnga tshan bcu drug tshan dang ni/ /gleng gzhi rkyang pa gtam gyi gzhi/ /ma na

pi ka ma mo dang / /lus sogs ston pa tha ma ste/ /le'u dag tu yang dag 'dod/ /thog mar zhus pa de yang ni/ /rnam 'byed ltung ba sde bzhi dang / /rang byung la sogs gzhi rnams kyi/ /gtan la 'bebs pa dag tu 'dod/ /de nyid dris

lan zhes kyang bsgrags/ /de nas 'dul byed dag yin te/ /pham pa bzhi dang lhag ma yi/ /smyan gyi ltung ba yan chad dag /gtan la 'bebs par byed pa yin/ /de nas gcig las 'phros pa ste/ /gcig nas bcu yi bar du

yin/ /gcig las 'dzegs pa zhes kyang bsgrags/ /de nas 'dul ba lnga tshan te/ /lnga lnga ston phyir lnga tshan no/ /bcu drug sde tshan ston pa'i phyir/ /de nas 'dul ba bcu drug tshan/ /gleng gzhi la ni sgo lnga las/ /

dang po bzhi la sdom gyi ni/ /tshigs bcad bcu bcu'o lnga pa la/ /sdom gyi tshigs bcad drug yod de/ /gleng gzhi dag la brten pa'i phyir/ /gleng gzhi zhes ni btags pa yin/ /rkyang pa sgo bzhi re re yang / /tshigs bcad bcu bcu'o

de nyid la/ /sil bu zhes bya bslab pa'i gzhi/ /rigs mi 'thun pa phra mo rnams/ /ston phyir don dang ldan pa yin/ /'dul ba gtam gyi dngos po ni/ /ldebs kyi tshul du byung ba ste/ /sdom gyi tshig gis bsdus pa med/ /

mU la zhes pa'i sgra yi don/ /gzhi dang rtsa ba dngos po la'ang / /'jug phyir gtam gyi gzhir yang 'gyur/ /ma na pi ka'i sgo dang po/ /tshigs bcad bcu yin gnyis pa la/ /tshigs bcad bcu dang lhag tsam yod/ /shin du phra zhib che

bas na/ /bram ze'i bu mo lta bu zhes/ /don dang 'thun pa'i mtshan yin no/ /'dul ba ma mo lta bu la/ /bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i phung po dang / /rab tu ldan dang bya ba yi/ /phung po gsum du shes par bya/ /ma dang 'dra phyir ma mo'o/ /

lus dang dmigs pa byin brlab dang / /mtshan nyid gleng gzhi ngo bo dang / /'bras bu'i don rnams tha ma ste/ /u pA li yis zhus pa ni/ /de dag rnams kyis rdzogs pa yin/ /mtshan gyi grangs kyi rim pa dang / /mtshan gyi bshad

pa de yin pas/ /de ltar bsdogs nas blta bar bya/ /de ltar na gzhung dam pa'i brjod bya don gyi lus ni de dag nyid yin la/ rjod byed gzhung gi lus ni zhu ba ma rdzogs pa la 'grel par/ 'phags pa nye ba 'khor gyis zhus pa'i gzhung

rgya gar yul pa yang sho lo ka nyis stong tsam gyi tshad cig la lan spyod pa kho na'o zhes yul kha cig na zhu ba ma rdzogs pa la sho lo ka nyis stong las med pa'ang bshad mod kyi/ bod du 'gyur ba'i zhu ba ma rdzogs pa la sho lo ka sum

stong drug brgya ste bam po bcu gnyis dang / zhu ba rdzogs pa la sho lo ka khri lnga stong dgu brgya ste/ bam po lnga bcu rtsa gsum yod pas spyir bsdoms na sho lo ka khri dgu stong lnga brgya ste/ bam po drug bcu rtsa lnga yod do// //

bsod nams chen po'i dpal gyis phyogs las rnam par rgyal ba stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po dang mtshungs pa rgyal po chen po'i bla'i mchod gnas bde bar gshegs pa'i gzhung lugs mang du thos pa/

rig pa dang grol ba'i spobs pa dge ba can/ lung dang rigs pa'i dbang phyug /gangs can gyi rgyud kyi mkhas pa chen po/ sdom brtson dam pa shAkya'i dge slong 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis/ bka' 'gyur legs par bzhengs pa

rnams las 'di dag ni mkhan po chen po mchims kyis dge ba'i bshes gnyen rgya 'dul ba 'dzin pa zhal bzhugs pa'i dus na/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen 'dul ba 'dzin pa zhing mo che ba byang chub seng ges gnyer mdzad nas/

lung phran tshegs kyi bam po bcu gnyis ma tshang ba dang / gzhung bla ma'i zhu ba ma rdzogs pa bam po bcu gnyis dang / sdom tshig yi ge tshar gnyis ma tshang ba rnams bsam yas mchims phu la sogs pa dbus gtsang gi gtsug lag

khang rnams nas btsal te/ la stod 'ol rgod kyi gtsug lag khang du gnas brtan d+harmA seng ges lung sde bzhi tshang bar bzhengs pa snar thang gi gtsug lag khang du gdan drangs te/ de la dpe phyi mdzad nas bzhengs pa dang / gzhan

yang chu mig ring mo'i gtsug lag khang dang / rung klung shod grog gi gtsug lag khang gi 'dul ba lung la sogs pa rnams la gtugs te snga zhus legs par bgyis nas bzhengs pa sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa'i rtsa ba legs par gsungs

pa dam pa'i chos 'dul ba lung sde bzhi'o/ /de'i bka' 'gyur gyi dpe phyi rnam par dag pa rnams/ mkhas pa'i 'byung gnas dpal snar thang gi gtsug lag khang nas gdan drangs te/ 'phags pa 'jig rten dbang phyug gi

sprul pa'i sku chos rgyal srong btsan sgam po'i nang blon chen po mgar stong btsan yul zungs kyi rgyud pa/ gtsug lag gnyis kyi mdzad pas/ bstan pa rin po che'i zhabs tog la g.yel ba mi mnga' zhing / 'gro ba mang po'i mgon

skyabs dam par gyur pa dpal ldan rgyal ba'i sde yis/ 'gro ba ma lus pa'i gnas skabs dang mthar thug gi phan bde ma lus pa'i 'byung gnas rgyal ba'i bstan pa rin po che yun ring du gnas shing / phyogs kun du dar zhing rgyas

par bya ba'i phyir/ bod khams su smon lam gyi stobs can mnga' bdag lha btsan po byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / lo paN skyes mchog khyad par can rnams kyi bdag rkyen la brten nas/ bde bar gshegs pa'i

gsung rab thog mtha' bar du dge zhing sgro skur gyi mtha' dang bral la gzhung lugs ngan pa'i dri mas dben pa mdo sde dang / rgyud sde'i phyogs snga phyir bod du 'gyur ro cog rnams mi'i dbang po tho ge na the mur gyi ring la/ ti shri kun dga' rgyal

mtshan dpal bzang po bstan pa skyong ba'i dus/ rgyal ba'i bstan pa lnga brgya bdun pa'i mthar nye ba/ 'gro ba'i bla ma ston pa gdul bya'i ngor zhi bar gshegs pa'i tshul bstan nas lo sum stong bzhi brgya brgyad bcu 'das pa me mo phag

gi lo gsar gyi zla ba tshes grangs gza' skar bzang po la dbu btsugs te/ rgyal ba'i sras po rig pa 'dzin pa byang chub dpal ldan gyis/ bstan pa la shes nas mi phyed pa'i dad pa brtan pos kun nas bslang nas zhal ta'i rim pa rnams

dang / rgyu'i dngos po bzang zhing mang la kha na ma tho ba med pas 'thun pa'i rkyen bsgrubs nas bstan pa'i 'byung gnas dpal na len dra dang mtshungs pa sprul pa'i rgyal po se chen gan gyi dgos kyi lha khang dpal gung thang gi gtsug lag khang chen

por legs par bzhengs te/ sde snod kyi tshul la cung zad blo kha phyogs pa thang po che ba'i btsun pa kun dga' 'bum gyis kha ta dang / zhus dag gi dang dos pa bgyis shing / gzhan yang dad pa dang brtson 'grus che zhing blo gros gsal ba'i sdom

brtson dam pa mang du thos shing sde snod 'dzin pa mkhas pa rnams kyis/ rgya gar skad la sogs pa legs par sbyar ba'i skad sor bzhag rnams ni sngon gyi lo ts+tsha ba chen po rnams kyis mdzad pa'i bye brag tu rtogs byed chen po

dang / sgra sbyor bam po gnyis pa la sogs pa la brten nas dag par byas shing / bod skad rnams ni yul skad dang / 'phral skad ngan pa rnams dang ma 'dres par bod yul gyi sngon gyi brda' mes mkhan po rnams dang /

sgyur byed dam pa snga phyir byon pa rnams kyi brda' gsar rnying dang / skad gsar bcad la sogs pa'i rjes su 'brangs nas da drag dang / ma mya dang / sa stsogs la sogs pa yod med rnams mkhas pa rnams kyis ji ltar

mdzad pa ltar brda' don ma nor bar dag par bgyis nas/ gzhi dung gi sa gzhi ltar dkar 'jam mkhregs pa lho rgyal po lha khang gi sho gu la/ dam che zhing mdangs gsal ba ud pal sngon po lta bu rgya nag chen po las

'ongs pa'i snag tshas/ 'bur dkyus tshugs gsum la mkhas pa'i mthar phyin pas yi ge'i rig byed la slob dpon gyi go 'phang thob pas dag snyoms mdzes par bzhengs pa dpon dpal bzangs rin chen dang / sangs rgyas grags

la sogs pa dbus gtsang gi yi ge pa yid gzhungs shing mkhas pa rnams kyis legs par bris pa la zhus dag lan gsum du bgyis te bzhengs pa rnams/ sa mo glang gi lo bkra shis lo gsar gyi zla ba la legs par grub cing /

'bras bu dang bsgrub pa'i dus kyi lnga brgya phrag drug dang / lung mngon pa'i dus kyi bzhi brgya brgyad bcu rtsa gnyis 'das la/ lhag ma mngon pa'i lo bcwa brgyad dang / mdo sde/ 'dul ba/ rtags tsam 'dzin pa'i lnga brgya phrag gsum

ste/ stong lnga brgya bcwa brgyad bstan pa'i lhag mar yod pa'i dus su bka' 'gyur legs par grub pa rnams las 'di dag ni lung sde bzhi'o/ /'dul ba lung phal che ba la dge slong pha ma'i so sor thar pa dang zhu ba ma rdzogs pa

bzhengs pa med mod kyi 'on kyang so sor thar pa gnyis rnam 'byed gnyis kyi rtsa ba yin zhing / rnam 'byed gnyis ni so sor thar pa rnam pa gnyis kyi 'grel pa yin la/ zhu ba ma rdzogs pa ni zhu ba dag shos yin pa'i phyir lung rnam 'byed so so'i

dbu dang / gzhung bla ma ma rdzogs pa dbu nyid du bzhengs so/ /lung sde bzhi'i go rim ni gzhi dang / rnam par 'byed pa dang / de dag gi dka' ba'i gnas zhus lan gyis gtan la 'bebs pa gzhung bla ma dang / de dag tu ma tshang ba kha skong ba

phran tshegs so/ /don gyi go rims de ltar yin yang mkhas pa rnams kyis gzhi dang / rnam par 'byed pa'i rjes la phran tshegs dang / de'i rjes la gzhung dam pa nyid bris shing / ka cog la sogs pas mdzad pa'i mtshan byang dkar chag

las kyang rim pa de kho na ltar 'byung bas 'dir yang gzhung dam pa mjug nyid du bris so/ /'di rnams kyi bam po'i grangs ni sho lo ka sum brgya la bam po rer byas nas lung gzhi la bam po brgya dang dgu/ dge slong pha'i rnam 'byed la bam po brgyad bcu rtsa gsum

dang bam po sum cha/ dge slong ma'i rnam 'byed la bam po nyi shu rtsa brgyad/ phran tshegs la bam po lnga bcu rtsa dgu/ gzhung bla ma'i zhu ba ma rdzogs pa la bam po bcu gnyis/ zhu ba rdzogs pa'i gzhung dam pa la bam po lnga bcu rtsa gsum ste bsdoms

na gzhung dam pa la bam po drug bcu rtsa lnga yod pas spyir lung sde bzhi chad pa la bam po sum brgya bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi dang bam po sum cha yod do/ /sngar ma tshang ba rnams tshang bar bzhengs pa'i tshul ni phran tshegs dang / zhu ba ma rdzogs pa'i

mjug dag tu bris zin pa'i phyir de dag tu blta bar bya'o// de ltar bsod nams dpal gyis rab mtho ba/ /'dzam gling mi dbang chen po'i mdzad pa ltar/ /mchog gi blo gros mtshungs pa med pa des/ /sdom brtson

dam pa dge sbyong chen po de'i/ /thugs dgongs bla med rdzogs par bya phyir dang / /bstan pa spel phyir bde bar gshegs pa'i gsung / /gangs ri'i khrod 'dir ji snyed 'gyur ro cog /legs par bzhengs par gyur ba
de dag las/ /'di ni ston pa'i gsung rab bstan pa yi/ /rtsa ba legs gsungs dam chos 'dul ba lung / /de ltar dpal ldan lhag bsam dag pa'i mthus/ /gsung rab rin chen tshul bzhin bzhengs pa las//

byung ba'i dge ba ston ka'i zla 'od dang / /mkha' ltar dag cing yangs pa gang thob des/ /'gro kun phan bde'i 'byung gnas rgyal ba yi/ /bstan pa rin phyogs dus kun khyab cing / /sde 'dzin skyong dang bsrung ba'i

dam pa rnams/ /skye dgu'i dpal du yun ring bzhugs gyur cig /gang gis gsung rab dri med 'di bzhengs ba'i/ /rgyal ba'i sras po byang chub dpal ldan yang / /bstan dang 'gro ba'i rtsa lag dam par ni/ /sa chen steng

'dir yun ring bzhugs gyur cig /khyad par du yang des pas sa skyong ba'i/ /mi dbang yon mchod 'khor dang bcas pa rnam/ /snyun med sku tshe ring zhing chab srid brtan/ /byams brtse'i thugs kyis 'gro ba skyong

gyur cig /srid 'bangs rnams kyang phan tshun byams ldan zhing / /nad dang mu ge 'thab rtsod las sogs pa/ /phyi nang nyer 'tshe'i gnod pa kun zhi nas/ /tshe ring 'byor ldan bstan la dad gyur cig /gang dag 'di la sgo

gsum gus pa yis/ /bya ba byed dang rjes su yi rang dang / /rgyu rkyen 'bul dang chos spyod rnam bcu yis/ /tshul bzhin sgrub par byed pa de dag kyang / /tshe 'dir tshe ring nad med 'byor ldan zhing / /skye zhing skye ba'i skye ba thams cad

du'ang / /'khor lo bzhi dang yon tan rnam bdun dang / /rnam smin brgyad ldan dal 'byor lus thob nas/ /mthong dang bsgom pas spang bya'i nyon mongs dang / /shes bya'i sgrib pa bag chags bcas pa kun/ /spong byed

gnyen po lam lnga sa bcu rnams/ /rim gyis bgrod nas kun mkhyen thob par shog /gang gis dgag sgrub gnang ba'i gnas ston cing / /mtha' gnyis spyod pa spangs nas 'khor ba las/ /nges par 'byung ba'i tshul khrims
gsal byed pa/ /legs gsungs dam chos 'dul ba'i bkra shis shog / // rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya b+ha dra tsar+ya pra Ni d+hA na rA dzA/ bod skad du/
'phags pa bzang po spyod pa'i smon lam gyi rgyal po/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ji snyed su dag phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na/ /dus gsum gshegs pa mi yi seng ge kun/ /bdag gis ma

lus de dag thams cad la/ /lus dang ngag yid dang bas phyag bgyi'o/ /bzang po spyod pa'i smon lam stobs dag gis/ /rgyal ba thams cad yid kyis mngon sum du/ /zhing gi rdul snyed lus rab btud pa yis/ /rgyal ba

kun la rab tu phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdul gcig steng na rdul snyed sangs rgyas rnams/ /sangs rgyas sras kyi dbus na bzhugs pa dag /de ltar chos kyi dbyings rnams ma lus pa/ /thams cad rgyal ba dag gis gang bar
mos/ /de dag bsngags pa mi zad rgya mtsho rnams/ /dbyangs kyi yan lag rgya mtsho'i sgra kun gyis/ /rgyal ba kun gyis yon tan rab brjod cing / /bde bar gshegs pa thams cad bdag gis bstod/ /

me tog dam pa phreng ba dam pa dang / /sil snyan rnams dang byug pa gdugs mchog dang / /mar me mchog dang bdug pa dam pa yis/ /rgyal ba de dag la ni mchod par bgyi/ /na bza' dam pa rnams dang dri mchog

dang / /phye ma'i phur ma ri rab mnyam pa dang / /bkod pa'i khyad par 'phags pa mchog kun gyis/ /rgyal ba de dag la ni mchod par bgyi/ /mchod pa gang rnams bla med rgya che ba/ /de dag rgyal ba thams cad la yang
mos/ /bzang po spyod la dad pa'i stobs dag gis/ /rgyal ba kun la phyag 'tshal mchod par bgyi/ /'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dbang gis na/ /lus dang ngag dang de bzhin yid kyis kyang / /sdig
pa bdag gis bgyis pa ci mchis pa/ /de dag thams cad bdag gis so sor bshags/ /phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba kun dang sangs rgyas sras/ /rang rgyal rnams dang slob dang mi slob dang / /'gro ba kun
gyi bsod nams gang la yang / /de dag kun gyi rjes su bdag yi rang / /gang rnams phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten sgron ma dag /byang chub rim par sangs rgyas ma chags brnyes/ /mgon po de dag bdag gis
thams cad la/ /'khor lo bla na med pa bskor bar bskul/ /mya ngan 'das ston gang bzhed de dag la/ /'gro ba kun la phan zhing bde ba'i phyir/ /bskal pa zhing gi rdul snyed bzhugs par yang / /bdag
gis thal mo rab sbyar gsol bar bgyi/ /phyag 'tshal ba dang mchod cing bshags pa dang / /rjes su yi rang bskul zhing gsol ba yis/ /dge ba cung zad bdag gis ci bsags pa/ /thams cad bdag gis

byang chub phyir bsngo'o/ /'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams dang phyogs bcu yi/ /'jig rten dag na gang bzhugs mchod par gyur/ /gang yang ma byon de dag rab myur bar/ /bsam rdzogs byang chub rim par sangs rgyas spyon/ /

phyogs bcu ga la'i zhing rnams ji snyed pa/ /de dag rgya cher yongs su dag par gyur/ /byang chub shing dbang drung gshegs rgyal ba dang / /sangs rgyas sras kyis rab tu gang bar shog /phyogs bcu'i sems can gang
rnams ji snyed pa/ /de dag rtag tu nad med bde bar gyur/ /'gro ba kun gyi chos kyi don rnams ni/ /'thun par gyur cing re ba'ang 'grub par shog /byang chub spyod pa dag ni bdag spyod cing / /'gro ba
kun du skye ba dran par gyur/ /tshe rabs kun du 'chi 'pho skye ba na/ /rtag tu bdag ni rab tu 'byung bar shog /rgyal ba kun gyi rjes su slob gyur te/ /bzang po sbyod pa yongs su rdzogs byed cing / /

tshul khrims spyod pa dri med yongs dag par/ /rtag tu ma nyams skyon med spyod par shog /lha yi skad dang klu dang gnod sbyin skad/ /grul bum dag dang mi yi skad rnams dang / /'gro ba kun gyi sgra rnams
ji tsam par/ /thams cad skad du bdag gis chos bstan to/ /des shing pha rol phyin la rab brtson te/ /byang chub sems ni nams kyang brjed ma gyur/ /sdig pa gang rnams sgrib par gyur pa dag /
de dag ma lus yongs su byang bar shog /las dang nyon mongs bdud kyi las rnams las/ /grol zhing 'jig rten 'gro ba rnams su yang / /ji ltar pad ma chus mi chags pa bzhin/ /nyi zla nam

mkha' thogs pa med ltar spyad/ /zhing gi khyon dang phyogs rnams ji tsam par/ /ngan song sdug bsngal rab tu zhi bar byed/ /bde ba dag la 'gro ba kun 'god cing / /'gro ba thams cad la ni phan par spyad/ /
byang chub spyod pa yongs su rdzogs byed cing / /sems can rnams kyi spyod dang 'thun par 'jug /bzang po spyod pa dag ni rab ston cing / /ma 'ongs bskal pa kun du spyod par gyur/ /bdag gi spyod dang
'thun par gang spyod pa/ /de dag dang ni rtag tu 'grogs par shog /lus dang ngag rnams dang ni sems kyis kyang / /spyod pa dag dang smon lam gcig tu spyad/ /bdag la phan par 'dod pa'i grogs po dag /
bzang po spyod pa rab tu ston pa rnams/ /de dag dang yang rtag tu phrad par shog /de dag bdag gis nam kyang yid mi dbyung / /sangs rgyas sras kyis bskor ba'i mgon po rnams/ /mngon sum

rtag tu bdag gis rgyal ba blta/ /ma 'ongs bskal pa kun du mi skyo bar/ /de dag la yang mchod pa rgya cher bgyi/ /rgyal ba rnams kyi dam pa'i chos 'dzin cing / /byang chub spyod pa kun du snang bar byed/ /
bzang po spyod pa rnam par spyad pa yang / /ma 'ongs bskal pa kun du spyad par bgyi/ /srid pa thams cad du ni 'khor ba na/ /bsod nams ye shes dag ni mi zad rnyed/ /thabs dang shes rab ting 'dzin
rnam thar dang / /yon tan kun gyi mi zad mdzod du gyur/ /rdul gcig steng na rdul snyed zhing rnams te/ /zhing der bsam gyis mi khyab sangs rgyas rnams/ /sangs rgyas sras kyi dbus na bzhugs pa la/ /

byang chub spyad pa spyod cing blta bar bgyi/ /de ltar ma lus thams cad phyogs su yang / /sgra tsam khyon la dus gsum tshad snyed kyi/ sangs rgyas rgya mtsho zhing rnams rgya mtsho dang / /bskal pa rgya mtshor spyod cing
rab tu 'jug /gsung gcig yan lag rgya mtsho'i sgra skad kyis/ /rgyal ba kun dbyangs yan lag rnam dag pa/ /'gro ba kun gyis bsam pa ji bzhin dbyangs/ /sangs rgyas gsung la rtag tu 'jug par bgyi/ /
dus gsum gshegs pa rgyal ba thams cad dag /'khor lo'i tshul rnams rab tu skor ba yi/ /de dag gi yang gsung dbyangs mi zad la/ /blo yi stobs kyis bdag kyang rab tu 'jug /ma 'ongs bskal pa thams cad
'jug par yang / /skad cig gcig gis bdag kyang 'jug par bgyi/ /gang yang bskal pa dus gsum tshad de dag /skad cig cha shas kyis ni zhugs par spyad/ /dus gsum gshegs pa mi yi seng ge gang / /

de dag skad cig gcig la bdag gis blta/ /rtag tu de dag gi ni spyod yul la/ /sgyu mar gyur pa'i rnam thar stobs kyis 'jug /gang yang dus gsum dag gi zhing bkod pa/ /de dag rdul gcig steng du mngon par bsgrub/ /
de ltar ma lus phyogs rnams thams cad du/ /rgyal ba dag gi zhing rnams bkod la 'jug /gang yang ma byon 'jig rten sgron ma rnams/ /de dag rim par 'tshang rgya 'khor lo bskor/ /mya ngan 'das pa rab

tu zhi mtha' ston/ /mgon po kun gyi drung du bdag mchi'o/ /kun du myur ba'i rdzu 'phrul stobs rnams dang / /kun nas sgo yi theg pa'i stobs dag dang / /kun du yon tan spyod pa'i stobs rnams dang / /kun
du khyab pa byams pa dag gi stobs/ /kun nas dge ba'i bsod nams stobs rnams dang / /chags pa med par gyur pa'i ye shes stobs/ /shes rab thabs dang ting 'dzin stobs dag gis/ /byang chub stobs rnams
yang dag sgrub par byed/ /las kyi stobs rnams yongs su dag byed cing / /nyon mongs stobs rnams kun tu 'joms par byed/ /bdud kyi stobs rnams stobs med rab byed cing / /bzang po sbyod pa'i stobs ni

rdzogs par bgyi/ /zhing rnams rgya mtsho rnam par dag byed cing / /sems can rgya mtsho dag ni rnam par 'grol/ /chos rnams rgya mtsho rab tu mthong byed cing / /ye shes rgya mtsho rab tu rtogs par byed/ /spyod pa rgya mtsho rnam

par dag byed cing / /smon lam rgya mtsho rab tu rdzogs par byed/ /sangs rgyas rgya mtsho rab tu mchod byed cing / /bskal pa rgya mtshor mi skyo spyad par bgyi/ /gang yang dus gsum gshegs pa rgyal ba yi/ /

byang chub spyod pa'i smon lam bye brag rnams/ /bzang po spyod pas byang chub sangs rgyas nas/ /de kun ma lus bdag gis rdzogs par bgyi/ /rgyal ba kun gyi sras kyi thu bo pa/ /gang gi ming ni kun du bzang

zhes bya/ /mkhas pa de dang mtshungs par spyad pa'i phyir/ /dge ba 'di dag thams cad rab tu bsngo/ /lus dang ngag dang yid kyang rnam dag cing / /spyod pa rnam dag zhing rnams yongs dag dang / /bsngo ba'ang

bzang po mkhas pa ci 'dra bar/ /de 'drar bdag kyang de dang mtshungs par shog /kun nas dge ba bzang po spyad pa'i phyir/ /'jam dpal gyi ni smon lam spyad par bgyi/ /ma 'ongs bskal pa kun tu mi skyo bar/ /

de yi bya ba ma lus rdzogs par bgyi/ /spyod pa dag ni tshad yod ma gyur cig /yon tan rnams kyang tshad gzung med par shog /spyod pa tshad med pa la gnas nas kyang / /de dag 'phrul pa thams cad 'tshal bar bgyi/ /
nam mkha'i mthar thug gyur pa ji tsam par/ /sems can ma lus mtha' yang de bzhin te/ /ji tsam las dang nyon mongs mthar gyur pa/ /bdag gi smon lam mtha' yang de tsam mo/ /gang yang
phyogs bcu'i zhing rnams mtha' yas pa/ /rin chen brgyan te rgyal ba rnams la phul/ /lha dang mi yi bde ba mchog rnams kyang / /zhing gi rdul snyed bskal par phul ba bas/ /gang gis bsngo ba'i
rgyal po 'di thos nas/ /byang chub mchog gi rjes su rab mos shing / /lan cig tsam yang dad pa skyed pa ni/ /bsod nams dam pa'i mchog tu 'di 'gyur ro/ /gang gis bzang spyod smon lam 'di btab pa/ /

des ni ngan song thams cad spangs par 'gyur/ /des ni grogs po ngan pa spangs pa yin/ /snang ba mtha' yas de yang des myur mthong / /de dag rnyed pa rab rnyed bde bar 'tsho/ /mi tshe 'dir yang de dag legs
par 'ongs/ /kun du bzang po de yang ci 'dra bar/ /de dag ring por mi thogs de bzhin 'gyur/ /mtshams med lnga po dag gi sdig pa rnams/ /gang gis mi shes dbang gis byas pa dag /

de yis bzang po spyod pa 'di brjod na/ /myur du ma lus yongs su byang bar 'gyur/ /ye shes dang ni gzugs dang mtshan rnams dang / /rigs dang kha dog rnams dang ldan par 'gyur/ /bdud dang mu stegs mang pos de mi
thub/ /'jig rten gsum po kun na'ang mchod par 'gyur/ /byang chub shing dbang drung du de myur 'gro/ /song nas sems can phan phyir der 'dug ste/ /byang chub sangs rgyas 'khor lo rab tu skor/ /bdud

rnams sde dang bcas pa thams cad 'dul/ /gang yang bzang po spyod pa'i smon lam 'di/ /'chang ba dang ni ston tam klog pa yis/ /de yi rnam par smin pa sangs rgyas mkhyen/ /byang chub mchog la som nyi ma
byed cig /'jam dpal ji ltar mkhyen cing dpa' ba dang / /kun du bzang po de yang de bzhin te/ /de dag gi ni rjes su bdag slob cing / /dge ba 'di dag thams cad rab tu bsngo/ /dus gsum gshegs pa

rgyal ba thams cad kyis/ /bsngo ba gang la mchog tu bsngags pa des/ /bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di kun kyang / /bzang po spyod phyir rab tu bsngo bar bgyi/ /bdag ni 'chi ba'i dus byed gyur pa na/ /sgrib pa

thams cad dag ni phyir bsal te/ /mngon sum snang ba mtha' yas de mthong nas/ /bde ba can gyi zhing der rab tu 'gro/ /der song nas ni smon lam 'di dag kyang / /thams cad ma lus mngon sum 'gyur bar shog /
de dag ma lus bdag gis yongs su bskang / /'jig rten ji srid sems can phan par bgyi/ /rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor bzang zhing dga' ba der/ /pad ma dam pa shin du mdzes las skyes/ /snang ba mtha'
yas rgyal las mngon sum du/ /lung bstan pa yang bdag gis der thob shog /der ni bdag gis lung bstan rab thob nas/ /sprul pa mang po bye ba phrag brgya yis/ /blo yi stobs kyis phyogs bcu rnams
su yang / /sems can rnams la phan pa mang po bgyi/ /bzang po spyod pa'i smon lam btab pa yis/ /dge ba cung zad bdag gis ci bsags pa/ /des ni 'gro ba'i dge ba'i smon
lam rnams/ /skad cig gcig gis thams cad 'byor par shog /bzang po spyod pa'i smon lam bsngos pa yis/ /bsod nams dam pa mtha' yas gang thob des/ /'gro ba
sdug bsngal chu bor bying ba rnams/ /'od dpag med pa'i gnas rab thob par shog /smon lam rgyal po 'di mchog gtso des ni/ /'gro ba mtha' yas kun la phan byed cing / /
kun du bzang pos brgyan pa'i gzhung grub cing / /ngan song rgyud gsum ma lus stongs par shog /'phags pa bzang po spyod pa'i smon lam gyi rgyal po/ rdzogs s+ho// //
'phags pa byams pa'i smon lam/ sangs rgyas kun la phyag 'tshal lo/ /drang srong lha mig ldan pa yi/ /byang chub sems dpa'
rnams dang yang / /nyan thos rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ngan 'gro thams cad zlog bgyid cing / /mtho ris lam ni rab ston la/ /rga shi med par 'dren bgyid pa/ /byang
chub sems la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sems kyi dbang du gyur pas na/ /bdag gis sdig pa ci bgyis pa/ /sangs rgyas spyan sngar mchis nas su/ /bdag gis de dag bshags par bgyi/ /
bdag las rnam pa gsum gang gis/ /bsod nams tshogs ni bskyed pa de/ /bdag gi kun mkhyen sa bon te/ /bdag gi byang chub mi zad shog /phyogs bcu dag gi zhing rnams su/ /
sangs rgyas mchod pa gang byung ba/ /sangs rgyas mkhyen pa'i yi rang bas/ /de la bdag ni yi rang ngo / /sdig pa thams cad bshags par bgyi/ /bsod nams kun la yi rang ngo / /sangs
rgyas kun la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdag ni ye shes mchog thob shog /phyogs bcu dag gi phyogs rnams na/ /sa bcu dag la gnas pa yi/ /byang chub sems dpa' byang chub mchog /
'tshang rgya bgyid par skul ma 'debs/ /byang chub dam par sangs rgyas shing / /sde dang bcas pa'i bdud btul nas/ /srog chags kun la sman slad du/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor
gyur cig /chos rnga chen po'i sgra yis ni/ /sdug bsngal sems can thar bgyid shog /bskal pa bye ba bsam yas su/ /chos ston mdzad cing bzhugs gyur cig /'dod
pa'i 'dam du bying gyur cing / /sred pa'i srad bus dam bcings pa/ /'ching ba kun gyis bcings bdag la/ /rkang gnyis mchog rnams gzigs su gsol/ /sems kyis dri mar
bgyis pa la/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni smod mi mdzad/ /sems can rnams la byams thugs ldan/ /srid pa'i mtsho las sgrol bar shog /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang bzhugs dang / /gang dag 'das
dang ma byon pa/ /de dag rjes su bdag slob cing / /byang chub spyad pa spyod gyur cig /pha rol phyin drug rdzogs bgyis nas/ /'gro drug sems can thar bgyid shog /mngon shes drug po mngon bgyis nas/ /
bla med byang chub reg gyur cig /ma skyes pa dang mi 'byung dang / /rang bzhin ma mchis gnas ma mchis/ /rnam rig ma mchis dngos ma mchis/ /stong pa'i chos ni rtogs par shog /sangs rgyas drang srong
chen po ltar/ /sems can ma mchis srog ma mchis/ /gang zag ma mchis gso ma mchis/ /bdag ma mchis pa'i chos rtogs shog /bdag 'dzin bdag gir 'dzin par ni/ /dngos
po kun la mi gnas par/ /sems can kun la bde slad du/ /ser sna ma mchis sbyin gtong shog /dngos po dngos po ma mchis pas/ /bdag gi longs spyod lhun grub shog /dngos po
thams cad rnam 'jig pas/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin rdzogs shog /khrims kyi tshul khrims skyon med cing / /tshul khrims rnam par dag dang ldan/ /rlom sems med pa'i tshul khrims kyis/ /
tshul khrims pha rol phyin rdzogs shog /sa 'am yang na chu 'am me/ /rlung gi khams ltar mi gnas shing / /bzod pa 'am khro ba ma mchis par/ /bzod pa'i pha rol phyin rdzogs shog /
brtson 'grus brtsams pa'i brtson 'grus kyis/ /brtan spro le lo ma mchis shing / /stobs dang ldan pa'i lus sems kyis/ /brtson 'grus pha rol phyin rdzogs shog /sgyu ma

lta bu'i ting 'dzin dang / /dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting 'dzin dang / /rdo rje lta bu'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /bsam gtan pha rol phyin rdzogs shog /rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang / /dus gsum mnyam pa nyid dang
yang / /rig gsum mngon sum bgyis pa yis/ /shes rab pha rol phyin rdzogs shog /sangs rgyas kun gyis bsngags pa dang / /'od dang gzi brjid 'bar ba dang / /byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus
kyis/ /bdag gi bsam pa rdzogs gyur cig /de ltar spyad pa spyod byed cing / /byams pa grags dang ldan pa yis/ /pha rol phyin drug rdzogs byas nas/ /sa bcu po la rab tu gnas/ /'phags

pa byams pa'i smon lam/ rdzogs s+ho// // @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ a gra tsar+yA pra Ni d+hA na/ bod skad du/ mchog gi spyod pa'i smon lam/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /skye dgu kun la sman dang bde slad du/ /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten sangs rgyas rnams la 'dud/
de dag la ni rjed cing mchod par bgyi/ /'gro kun byang chub mchog la reg gyur cing / /byams pa dang ni 'jam dpal mnga' bdag tog /chos kyi blo gros dpa' bo bdud rtsi gsung / /dpa' bo
de dag phyag 'tshal mkhyen pa ltar/ /de bzhin bdag kyang mi dbang rnams la 'dud/ /thugs rje ldan zhing 'jig rten don mdzad pa'i/ /rgyal ba mi mkhyen mi gzigs mi mnga' ba/ /mi dbang
thugs brtse byams la gnas pa yi/ /rgyal ba de kun bdag la dgongs su gsol/ /sngon gyi srid pa dag tu bdag nyid kyis/ /sdig pa'i lam rnams gang bgyis bdag gis bshags/ /
de bzhin lus ngag yid kyis bgyis pa rnams/ /de dag thams cad bdag gis so sor bshags/ /shAkya thub dang mi 'khrugs 'od dpag med/ /de dag gis ni phrin las yongs sbyangs dang / /'chags dang
bshags pa mkhyen cing rtogs gyur ltar/ /de bzhin bdag gis sdig pa bshags par bgyi/ /thams cad dga' mdzad skyes bu dam pa gang / /byang chub zhugs pa kun la gsol ba dang / /ngan song bzhi
po myur du zhi gyur cig /mi khom 'joms par bgyid cing rgyu bar shog /sangs rgyas bzang spyod dri med mnga' bdag dang / /de bzhin lhun po'i dpal dang nyi ma'i sgron/ /de dag bsod nams
yi rang mkhyen pa ltar/ /de bzhin bdag kyang bsod nams rjes yi rang / /phyogs bcu dag na sbyin pa spyod pa gang / /de bzhin tshul khrims ting 'dzin spyod rnams dang / /shes rab sgom dang bsod
nams stobs kun la/ /byang chub yon tan don du yi rang ngo / /rgyal ba kun gyi yon tan mtha' yas dang / /chos bstan byang chub 'jog bgyid thams cad la/ /byang chub yon tan don du yi rang ngo / /
'gro kun byang chub mchog la reg gyur cig /'jig rten rgyal ba gang bzhugs kun la bskul/ /phyogs bcu dag na byang chub rnyed pa gang / /de dag tshangs brgyas ji ltar gsol pa ltar/ /rgyal
rnams bzhugs shing chos mchog ston gyur cig /rgyal kun bskal pa mang por bzhugs par shog /'gro kun byang chub mchog la reg gyur cig /mi rnams thams cad mchog dang bla med pa/ /
'jig rten sgron ma bde gshegs myur gyur cig /sangs rgyas rnams la phyag 'tshal mchod gang dang / /las dge rnams la yid rang gang lags dang / /sdig pa'i las rnams bshags pa gang lags dang / /
rgyal ba rkang gnyis dbang rnams mthong gang dang / /bdag gis dge ba cung zad ci bgyis pa/ /lus dang ngag dang sems las byung yang rung / /bdag gis bgyis dang bgyid dang bgyid 'gyur gang / /
thams cad skye dgu sman slad stsal bar bgyi/ /ji ltar phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rnams mkhyen nas/ /stsal pa legs par stsal cing legs rgyas pa/ /de bzhin bdag gis skye dgu sman slad stsal/ /'gro kun
byang chub mchog la reg gyur cig /bdag gis 'gro la stsal ba gang lags pa'i/ /bsod nams 'bras bu bla med ci mchis pa/ /theg pa chen por yongs su bsngo bar bgyi/ /bdag la byang chub 'bras bu grub par
shog /mtshungs pa ma mchis kun nas sgo mo rnams/ /'gro ba'i don du bdag la mngon sum shog /'jam dpal gyi ni rjes su slob bgyid cing / /byang chub spyod pa'i smon lam gdab par bgyi/ /
mi gcig tsam gyi ched du'ang mnar med pa'i/ /tshor ba thams cad bdag gis myong bar gyur/ /bskal pa du mar bdag ni spro bar bgyi/ /'gro ba thams cad mya ngan med par shog /sems dmyal gshin rje'i

'jig rten sdug bsngal dang / /dud 'gro'i gnas rnams mi'i sdug bsngal dang / /'gro ba'i sdug bsngal phung po mtha' yas dang / /bdag la bab gyur 'gro ba bde bar shog /rgyal ba rnams kyi zhing ni rnam dag
dang / /sems can rnam dag ye shes rnam dag dang / /rgyal ba rnams kyi smon lam mtha' yas gang / /smon lam de kun bdag la grub par shog /bdag gi smon lam nyams par ma gyur cig /bdag ni nams
kyang skyo bar mi 'gyur shog /byang chub mchog ni bdag gis thob bar du/ /bskal pa du mar bdag ni spro bar shog /mchog gi spyod pa'i smon lam/ rdzogs s+ho// //
rgya gar gyi mkhan po pradz+nyA bar ma dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// // @/ /mar me'i lo rgyus dang smon lam gyi
mdo/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sngon sangs rgyas mar me mdzad kyis ston pa mdzad pa'i dus na/ rgyal po gser gyi lag pa zhes bya bas/ bcom ldan 'das mar me mdzad la

'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa khyod sngon gyi dus na dge ba'i rtsa ba ci zhig spyad na da ltar mtshan dang dpe byad du ldan te/ sku las 'od zer mtha' yas pa 'byung ba'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das

kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po nyon cig /ngas so so'i skye bo'i dus na phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad la byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ lus la ras bal gyi ye'u til mar gyi nang du btsos pa stong btsugs

te/ phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad la gtan pa med pa'i mchod par phul bas da lta rang nyid sangs rgyas mar me mdzad ces bya bar gyur pa yin no zhes gsungs pa dang / de la rgyal po chen po shin tu yid
rangs te/ de nas rgyal po des rang gi lag pa g.yas pa ras bal til mar gyis btsos pas dkris te me btang nas lag pa g.yon pa bar snang la brkyang ste/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad dang / bdag
gi ston pa bcom ldan 'das mar me mdzad dgongs su gsol lo/ /'gyod pa med pa'i sems kyis phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad yid kyis mngon sum du dmigs te/ gtan pa med pa'i mchod par
bsngos nas smon lam 'debs te/ 'di skad do/ /mar me'i snod ni/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po 'jig rten gyi khams tsam du gyur cig /snying po ni ri'i rgyal po ri rab tsam du gyur cig /

'od kyis ni srid pa'i rtse mo man chad nas mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba yan chad nas/ gzhan yang lcags ri chen po'i phyi rgyab na sems can rang gi las kyi sgrib pas bsgribs pa'i mun nag chen po'i nang na rang gi lag pa brkyang
bskum yang mi mthong ba'i gnas tshun chad snang zhing gsal bar gyur cig /yun ni dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas ji srid bzhugs pa de srid du gnas par gyur cig /grangs ni phyogs bcu 'jig rten gyi khams
mtha' yas pa na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas grangs med pa re re'i spyan lam du gsal bar gyur cig /mar me 'di gzugs med pa'i gnas su snang zhing gsal bar gyur cig /de ltar gsal ba'i mod la gzugs med

pa'i lha rnams mar me'i 'od kyis bskul ma thag tu mtshan dang dpe byad du ldan nas snyoms par 'jug pa'i skye mched bzhi las grol te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsam gtan la sogs pa snyoms par 'jug pa'i skal ba dang

ldan par gyur cig /mar me 'di gzugs na spyod pa'i lha rnams kyi gnas su gsal bar gyur cig /gzugs na spyod pa'i lha rnams ting nge 'dzin kyis dga' bde rtse gcig pa nyams su myong nas phyir mi ldog pa'i sa thob
par gyur cig /mar me 'di 'dod khams kyi lha rnams kyi gnas su snang zhing gsal bar gyur cig /'dod khams kyi lha rnams kyang lha'i 'dod pa'i longs spyod la sems ma chags shing rang gi sems la lta
zhing bsam gtan bzhi rims kyis snyoms par 'jug pa'i skal ba dang ldan par gyur cig /mar me 'di lha ma yin rnams kyi gnas su snang zhing gsal bar gyur cig /lha ma yin gyi nga rgyal dang / khro gtum

dang sems kyi gdug pa zhi nas tshad med pa bzhi dang ldan nas zhi gnas kyi sems yid la byed pa dang ldan par gyur cig /mar me 'di gling bzhi'i mi rnams kyi gnas su snang zhing gsal bar gyur cig /gling bzhi'i mi rnams kyang

sdug bsngal brgyad las thar nas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan par gyur cig /mar me 'di byol song rnams kyi gnas su snang zhing gsal bar gyur cig /byol song de dag gcig la gcig za ba dang / brdeg

brdung dang / gsad pa dang / bkol ba'i sdug bsngal dang / blun rmongs las thar shes rab rnam pa gsum dang ldan par gyur cig /mar me 'di gshin rje'i 'jig rten du snang zhing gsal bar gyur cig /gshin rje

rnams gsod gcod byed pa dang / brdeg brdung gi las las thar nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis pha rol tu phyin pa bsgrags pas sems can thams cad gtong ba'i sems 'byung bar gyur cig /mar me 'di pre ta'i

gnas su gsal bar gyur cig /pre ta rnams kyang bkres skom gyi sdug bsngal las thar nas byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyi thugs rje chen po'i byin gyi rlabs kyis zas dang skom gyis phongs pa rnams longs

spyod zad mi shes pa dang ldan zhing sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i dbang dang ldan par gyur cig /mar me 'di na raka rnams kyi gnas su gsal bar gyur cig /na raka ni sngon gyi las ngan pa'i rnam par smin pas tsha grang gi

sdug bsngal bzod par dka' ba nyams su myong ba las/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi thugs rje'i byin gyi rlabs kyis dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal tshad med pa las thar nas bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan
par gyur cig /mar me 'dis 'dzam bu'i gling gi phyi rol mun nag gi nang na 'thoms pa'i sems can rang gi lag pa g.yas pa brkyang ba yang mi mthong ba'i gnas su gsal bar gyur cig /

de dag sngon gyi las ngan pa'i rnam par smin pas zas dang skom 'dod pa las nam mkha' la rang gi lcags kyi sen mo yod pas brnyabs pas zas dang skom ma rnyed nas/ rang gi lus zin pa dang sha bcad de za ba de
dag de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyi thugs rje'i byin gyis mun nag chen po'i 'thoms pa las thar nas bde ba can gyi zhing khams su skye bar gyur cig /gzhan yang mar me 'di klu'i gnas su snang

zhing gsal bar gyur cig /des klu rnams gti mug dang ser sna'i mdud pa bkrol te gtong ba'i blo dang ldan zhing nam mkha' lding gis 'jigs pa dang / me dang / bye tshan la sogs te 'jigs pa chen po brgyad las thar
nas/ sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la skyabs su 'gro zhing srog 'tsho ba'i zhi gnas kyi chu'i thig le snying la gnas nas klu rnams 'dod pa'i yon tan dang ldan par gyur cig /mar me 'di lto

'phye chen po'i gnas su snang zhing gsal bar gyur cig /des lto 'phye chen po'i sdug bsngal zhi nas dga' ba rgya mtsho rnam par 'phrul ba'i shugs dang ldan par gyur cig /mar me 'dis 'dzam bu'i gling gi
spyir gnas pa'i sa bdag dang / lha dang / klu dang / sa bdag gi rgyal po pi ta li dang / sa'i rgyal mo chen mo dang / rgya mtsho chen po dang / mtsho bran dang / rdzing dang / khron pa
la gnas pa dang / klung chen po dang / klung phra mo dang / chu mig dang / lu ma la gnas pa dang / gangs ri mthon po'i rgyud la gnas pa dang / ri nag po dang / g.ya' dang / sha spang
dang / spang ri dang / nags chen po dang / shing gcig pa dang / gtsug lag khang dang / mchod rten dang / grong khyer dang / ljongs na gnas pa'i gnas su snang zhing gsal bar gyur cig /

de dag so so'i 'khrul pa'i rtog pa thams cad byang nas dkon mchog gsum la mi phyed pa'i dad pa dang ldan te/ byang chub kyi sems dang ldan nas thar pa thob pa'i rgyur gyur cig /de ltar deng mar me 'di'i yon

bdag gis kyang gtan pa med pa'i mchod pa 'di phul bas/ bdag dang mtha' yas pa'i sems can rnams de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad kyi zhabs drung du skyes te/ mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas sems can thams cad kyi
dpal mgon du gyur cig /rgyal po gser gyi lag pas mdzad pa'i mar me'i smon lam gyi mdo/ rdzogs s+ho// // @#/ /dkon mchog

gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gser 'od dam pa'i rnga chen sgra yis ni/ /stong gsum 'jig rten 'jig rten gsum 'di na/ /ngan song sdug bsngal gshin rje'i sdug bsngal dang / /dbul ba'i sdug bsngal sdug bsngal
zhi bar shog /rnga bo che yi sgra skad 'di yis ni/ /'jig rten rmongs pa thams cad zhi gyur cig /ji ltar thub dbang 'jigs med 'jigs zhi ltar/ /sems can 'jigs med 'jigs dang bral bar
shog /ji ltar 'khor bar kun mkhyen thub dbang po/ /'phags pa'i yon tan kun dang ldan pa ltar/ /skye dgu ting 'dzin byang chub yan lag gi/ /yon tan ldan zhing yon tan rgya mtshor gyur/ /
rnga bo che yi sgra skad 'di yis ni/ /sems can thams cad tshangs pa'i sgra ldan gyur/ /sangs rgyas dam pa byang chub mchog reg shog /chos kyi 'khor lo dge ba skor gyur cig /bskal pa bsam
gyis mi khyab bzhugs par shog /'gro la phan phyir chos kyang ston gyur cig /nyon mongs 'joms gyur sdug bsngal sel bar shog /'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug zhi gyur cig /sems can gang
dag ngan song sar gnas te/ /rus pa'i lus la me lce rab 'bar ba/ /de dag rnga chen bsgrags pa thos gyur cig /sangs rgyas phyag 'tshal lo zhes tshig thos shog /sems can kun gyis tshe rabs

brgya dag dang / /tshe rabs stong phrag bye bar skye dran shog /thub pa'i dbang po rtag tu dran gyur cing / /de dag gi ni rgya chen gsung thos shog /rnga bo che yi sgra skad 'di yis ni/ /sangs rgyas rnams

dang rtag tu 'grogs rnyed gyur/ /sdig pa'i las rnams rnam par spong bar shog /bya ba dge ba rnams ni spyod gyur cig /mi dang lha dang srog chags thams cad kyi/ /de dag bsam dang smon lam gang yin pa/ /
rnga bo che yi sgra skad 'di yis ni/ /de dag rnams kyi de kun rdzogs gyur cig /sems can gang dag sems dmyal mi bzad skyes/ /lus la me lce kun tu rab tu 'bar/ /skyabs med mya ngan bcas shing yongs
'khyam pa/ /me rnams ma lus rab tu zhi bar shog /sems dmyal yi dags mi yi 'jig rten na/ /sems can sdug bsngal mi bzad drag po gang / /rnga bo che yi sgra skad 'di yis ni/ /de dag rnams
kyi sdug bsngal kun zhi shog /rten med dpung gnyen med pa dang / /skyabs med par ni gyur pa dag /de rnams la ni skyob pa dang / /dpung gnyen rten mchog bdag gyur cig /sangs rgyas
rkang gnyis dam pa dag /thugs brtse thugs rje ldan pa'i thugs/ /gang dag phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na/ /bzhugs pa bdag la dgongs su gsol/ /bdag gis sngon chad sdig pa'i las/ /
shin tu mi bzad gang bgyis pa/ /stobs bcu'i spyan sngar bdag mchis te/ /de dag thams cad bshags par bgyi/ /pha ma dag tu mi 'dzin dang / /sangs rgyas rnams su mi 'dzin dang / /dge ba
dag tu mi 'dzin pas/ /sdig pa bdag gis gang bgyis dang / /phyug pa'i rgyags pas dregs pa dang / /rigs dang longs spyod rgyags pa dang / /gzhon pa'i rgyags pas dregs pa yis/ /bdag gis sdig pa
gang bgyis dang / /nyes bsams nyes par smras pa dang / /nyes par bgyis pa'i las rnams dang / /nyes pa'i dmigs su ma bltas pas/ /bdag gis sdig pa gang bgyis dang / /byis pa'i blo yis 'jug pa

dang / /mi shes mun pa'i sems dang ni/ /sdig pa'i grogs po'i dbang gyur dang / /nyon mongs rnam par 'khrug sems dang / /rtsed mo dga' ba'i dbang nyid dang / /mya ngan dang ni nad dbang dang / /nor gyis mi chog nyes pa yis/ /

bdag gis sdig pa gang bgyis dang / /'phags min skye bo 'dre ba dang / /phrag dog ser sna sgyu dang ni/ /g.yo dang dbul ba'i nyes pa yis/ /bdag gis sdig pa gang bgyis dang / /phongs pa byung ba'i dus kyi tshe/ /'dod

pa rnams dang 'jigs rgyu dang / /phyug po ma yin gyur pa yis/ /bdag gis sdig pa gang bgyis dang / /g.yo ba'i sems kyis dbang nyid dang / /'dod dang khro ba'i dbang dag dang / /bkres dang skom gyis nyen pa
yis/ /bdag gis sdig pa gang bgyis dang / /bza' ba dag dang btung ba dang / /bud med rgyu dang gos kyi phyir/ /nyon mongs gdung ba sna tshogs kyis/ /bdag gis sdig pa gang bgyis dang / /lus dang
ngag dang yid kyis sdig /nyes par spyad pa rnam gsum bsags/ /'di 'dra'i tshul gyis gang bgyis pa/ /de dag thams cad bdag 'chags so/ /sangs rgyas rnams dang chos rnams dang / /
de bzhin nyan thos rnams la yang / /gus pa ma lags gang bgyis pa/ /de dag thams cad bdag 'chags so/ /gang yang rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / /byang chub sems dpa' rnams la yang / /
gus pa ma lags bgyis pa rnams/ /de dag thams cad bdag 'chags so/ /dam chos smra ba rnams la yang / /gus pa ma lags bgyis pa dang / /chos la'ang gus par ma bgyis pa/ /de dag
thams cad bdag 'chags so/ /bdag gis rtag tu mi shes pas/ /dam pa'i chos ni spangs pa dang / /pha ma rnams la ma gus gang / /de dag thams cad bdag 'chags so/ /blun pa dang ni byis pa
dang / /'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang / /nga rgyal dregs pas bsgribs bgyis pa/ /de dag thams cad bdag 'chags so/ /bdag ni phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten du/ /stobs bcu rnams la mchod par shog /
bdag ni phyogs bcur sems can rnams/ /sdug bsngal kun las 'don gyur cig /sems can bsam gyis mi khyab kun/ /sa bcu dag la 'god par shog /sa bcu dag la gnas nas kyang / /
thams cad de bzhin gshegs gyur cig /ji srid sdug bsngal rgya mtsho las/ /de kun thar bgyid nus srid du/ /sems can re re'i phyir yang ni/ /bskal pa bye bar spyod par shog /gser
'od dam pa zhes bgyi ba/ /las rnams thams cad byang byed pa/ /zab mo dag ni ston pa 'di/ /sems can de dag ston gyur cig /gang gis bskal pa stong rnams su/ /sdig pa shin du mi bzad
bgyis/ /lan cig rab tu bshags pa yis/ /de dag thams cad byang bar 'gyur/ /gang gis las kyi sgrib pa rnams/ /myur du yang dag zad 'gyur ba/ /gser 'od dam pa dge ba yi/ /bshags

pa 'di dag bshags nas ni/ /rin chen 'byung gnas mchog bcu po/ /sa bcu la ni gnas par shog /sangs rgyas yon tan snang gyur cig /srid pa'i mtsho las sgrol bar shog /sangs rgyas rgya mtsho chu bo dang / /
yon tan rgya mtsho zab mo de/ /sangs rgyas yon tan bsam yas kyis/ /thams cad mkhyen du rdzogs par shog /ting 'dzin brgya phrag stong rnams dang / /gzungs rnams bsam gyis mi khyab dang / /dbang stobs

byang chub yan lag gis/ /stobs bcu dam par 'gyur bar shog /dgongs pa'i thugs kyis sangs rgyas rnams/ /bdag la rnam par gzigs su gsol/ /thugs rje ldan pa'i thugs kyis ni/ /nongs par rab tu gzung du gsol/ /

bdag gis bskal pa brgya rnams su/ /sngon chad sdig pa gang bgyis pa/ /de phyir bdag ni mya ngan sems/ /phongs dang mya ngan 'jigs pas gzir/ /sdig pa'i las la 'jigs par bgyid/ /yid ni rtag tu dman par gyur/ /

gang dang gang du 'gro bgyid pa/ /bdag ni gang du'ang dga' ma mchis/ /sangs rgyas thams cad thugs rjer ldan/ /'gro ba kun gyi 'jigs sel bas/ /nongs pa rab tu gzung du gsol/ /'jigs pa dag las bdag thar
mdzod/ /bdag gi nyon mongs las rnams kyi/ /dri ma de bzhin gshegs pas shol/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyis bdag la ni/ /snying rje'i chu yis bkru bar gsol/ /sdig pa thams cad bshags par bgyi/ /sngon chad
bdag gis gang bgyis dang / /da ltar bdag gi sdig pa gang / /de dag thams cad bdag 'chags so/ /nongs par bgyid pa'i las rnams kun/ /slan chad mi bgyid bsdam par bgyi/ /bdag gis nongs par bgyis
pa gang / /sdig de bcab par mi bgyi'o/ /lus kyi las ni rnam gsum dang / /ngag gi rnam pa bzhi dag dang / /yid kyi rnam pa gsum po rnams/ /de dag thams cad bdag 'chags so/ /lus kyis
bgyis dang ngag gi las/ /yid kyis rnam par bsams pa dang / /las rnams bcu po bgyis pa dag /de dag thams cad bdag 'chags so/ /mi dge'i las bcu spangs nas su/ /dge ba bcu po bsten
bgyis la/ /sa bcu la ni bdag gnas shing / /stobs bcu mchog tu 'gyur bar shog /bdag gis sdig pa'i las gang dag /mi 'dod 'bras bu thob bgyid pa/ /sangs rgyas spyan sngar mchis nas ni/ /de dag thams cad
bshags par bgyi/ /'dzam bu'i gling 'dir gang dag dang / /'jig rten khams ni gzhan dag tu/ /gang rnams dge ba'i las bgyid pa/ /de dag kun la yid rang ngo / /lus dang ngag dang yid kyis kyang / /

bdag gis bsod nams gang bsgrubs pa/ /bdag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba des/ /byang chub mchog la reg par shog /srid 'gro nyam dar byis pa'i blo yis ni/ /shin du mi bzad sdig pa gang bgyis pa/ /stobs bcu mi nyams

spyan sngar mchis nas ni/ /sdig pa de kun so sor bshags par bgyi/ /skye ba nyam nga srid pa nyam nga dang / /'jig rten nyam nga g.yo sems nyam nga bar/ /lus kyi spyod pa nyam nga sna tshogs kyis/ /bdag gis sdig pa gang bsags de 'chags

so/ /byis pa blun byas nyon mongs nyam nga dang / /sdig pa'i grogs dang phrad pa nyam nga dang / /srid pa nyam nga 'dod chags nyam nga dang / /zhe sdang gti mug mun pa nyam nga dang / /dal ba'i nyam nga dus kyi nyam nga dang / /bsod nams sgrub pa
nyam nga dag gis kyang / /rgyal ba mi mnyam mngon sum mchis nas ni/ /sdig pa de kun so sor bshags par bgyi/ /sangs rgyas gser mdog ri snang ri rab 'dra/ /yon tan rgya mtsho 'dra la phyag 'tshal lo/ /

rgyal ba de dag rnams la skyabs su mchi/ /rgyal ba de dag kun la mgos phyag 'tshal/ /gser mdog gser ni dri ma med pa'i gser gyi 'od/ /dri med rnam dag bai dUr+ya'i yan lag spyan/ /sangs rgyas nyi ma dpal
gzi grags 'bar 'byung ba'i gnas/ /thugs rje'i 'od zer dag gis mun pa mun nag bsal/ /yan lag rab tu dri med rab bzang rnam par mdzes/ /sangs rgyas nyi ma yan lag dri med gser 'dras
khyab/ /nyon mongs mes gdungs yid can 'bar ba'i me 'dra la/ /thub pa'i zla ba'i 'od zer dra bas tshim par mdzad/ /mtshan mchog sum bcu gnyis kyis dbang po yan lag mdzes/ /dpe byad bzang po

dag gis yan lag rnam par mdzes/ /dpal gzi bsod nams 'bar 'khrugs 'od zer dra ba yis/ /'jig rten gsum na mun khrod nyi ma bzhin du bzhugs/ /dri med rgya chen kha dog sna tshogs bai dUr+ya/ /skya reng dmar

dang dngul dang shel bzhin yan lag dmar/ /'od zer dra ba rnam pa sna tshogs legs brgyan pas/ /thub chen khyod ni nyi ma bzhin du de yis mdzes/ /mya ngan 'khrugs pa 'chi chu rga ba'i rba rlabs can/ /'khor ba'i klung chen
phongs pa'i chu bor lhung ba la/ /sdug bsngal rgya mtsho mchog tu rtsub cing shugs drag pa/ /bde gshegs nyi ma'i 'od zer mang po rnams kyis skems/ /yan lag gser gyi mdog tu rnam par snang / /ye shes
'byung gnas 'jig rten gsum kun mchog /rab mdzes mtshan gyi yan lag rnam spras pa/ /sangs rgyas gser sku 'bar la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ji ltar rgya mtsho'i chu ni dpag med dang / /ji ltar sa la
sa rdul mtha' yas dang / /ji ltar ri rab rdo mtha' mtshungs med dang / /ji ltar nam mkha'i mtha' ma mtha' yas pa/ /de bzhin sangs rgyas yon tan mtha' yas te/ /sems can kun gyis shes par mi
nus so/ /bskal pa du mar gzhal cing bsams kyang ni/ /yon tan mtha' ma shes par mi nus so/ /chu ni skra'i rtse mo'i tshad tsam dang / /rdor bcas rir bcas rgya mtshor bcas pa ni/ /
bskal par bgrangs na shes par nus kyang srid/ /sangs rgyas yon tan pha mtha' shes mi nus/ /yon tan kha dog snyan dang grags pa dang / /dge ba'i mtshan gyis brgyan pa'i sku lus dang / /dpe byad
bzang po brgyad bcus brgyan pa yis/ /sems can thams cad de 'drar gyur par shog /bdag ni dge ba'i las rnams 'di dag gis/ /'jig rten mi ring sangs rgyas 'gyur bar shog /'gro la phan phyir chos kyang
ston gyur cig /sems can sdug bsngal mang gzir thar byed shog /stobs bcas sder bcas bdud las rgyal gyur cig /chos kyi 'khor lo dge ba bskor bar shog /bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab gnas
gyur cig /bdud rtsi chu yis sems can tshim byed shog /ji ltar sngon gyi rgyal bas rdzogs pa ltar/ /pha rol phyin drug bla med rdzogs par shog /nyon mongs 'jom zhing sdug bsngal sel gyur cig /'dod

chags zhe sdang gti mug zhi byed shog /tshe rabs brgya dang tshe rabs bye ba stong / /bdag ni rtag tu tshe rabs dran par shog /thub pa'i dbang po rtag tu dran gyur cig /de dag rnams kyi gsung rgya che thos shog /bdag ni
dge ba'i las rnams 'di dag gis/ /rtag tu sangs rgyas 'grogs pa rnyed par shog /sdig pa'i las rnams rnam par spong gyur cig /dge ba'i 'byung gnas dag rnams spyod par shog /zhing rnams kun na
srog chags thams cad kyang / /'jig rten dag na sdug bsngal kun zhi gyur/ /sems can dbang po ma tshang yan lag nyams/ /de kun de'u re dbang po tshang bar shog /gang dag nad btab nyam chung lus
nyams dang / /phyogs bcu dag na skyabs med gyur pa rnams/ /de kun myur du nad las thar gyur cig /nad med stobs dang dbang po rnyed par shog /gang dag rgyal po chom rkun sgre'u bsdigs gsang
thug dang / /sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs brgya yis phongs gyur pa/ /sems can nyams thag gyur cing sdug bsngal de dag kun/ /'jigs mchog mi bzad brgya po de las thar gyur cig /gang dag
brdegs shing bcings pas bcings gzir ba/ /phongs pa sna tshogs dag na gnas gyur cing / /nyon mongs stong phrag du mas dkrugs nas kyang / /'jigs pa mi bzad mya ngan sna tshogs rnyed/ /de dag thams cad
bcings las grol gyur cig /brdegs pa dag ni brdegs las thar bar shog /gsad pa rnams kyang srog dang ldan gyur cig /phongs gyur thams cad 'jigs pa med par shog /sems can gang dag bkres sred skom gyis
gzir/ /de dag zas skom sna tshogs rnyed par shog /long bas gzugs rnams sna tshogs mthong gyur cig /'on pas yid 'ong sgra rnams thos par shog /gcer bu rnams kyis sna tshogs gos rnyed gyur/ /sems
can dbul pos gter rnams rnyed par shog /nor 'bru rin chen sna tshogs mang po yis/ /sems can thams cad bde dang ldan par shog /gang yang sdug bsngal tshe rabs gnod ma gyur / /sems can thams
cad blta na sdug pa dang / /gzugs bzang mdzes shing tshul du shes par shog /rtag tu bde ba du ma stsogs gyur cig /yid kyis zas skom rab 'byor bsod nams dag /bsams ma thag tu de dag grub gyur cig /

rdza rnga cang te'u pi bang sgra snyan dang / /chu mig mtshe'u rdzing bu lteng ka dag /gser gyi pad ma ud pal pad ma can/ /zas skom gos nor mu tig nor bu dbyig /rgyan gser rin chen sna tshogs bai dUr+ya/ /

de dag bsams ma thag tu grub gyur cig /'jig rten gang na'ang sdug bsngal sgra ma byung / /sems can gcig kyang mi 'phrod mthong ma gyur/ /de dag thams cad kha dog rgya chen dang / /phan tshun du ni 'od byed
'gyur bar shog /mi'i 'jig rten phun sum tshogs gang yod/ /de dag bsams par skye bar de dag gyur/ /bsam pa thams cad bsams ma thag tu yang / /bsod nams 'bras bus yongs su rdzogs par shog /
spos dang phreng ba dag dang byug pa dang / /gos dang phye ma me tog sna tshogs dag /ljon shing dag las dus gsum 'bab par shog /sems can de dag len cing dgar gyur cig /de bzhin gshegs pa
bsam yas thams cad dang / /rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos dang / /rdul bral dri med brtan pa'i chos la yang / /phyogs bcu rnams su mchod pa byed par shog /'gro ba dma' ba
thams cad spong gyur cig /mi khom brgyad po dag las 'das par shog /dal ba'i rgyal po dam pa thob gyur cig /rtag tu sangs rgyas 'grogs pa thob par shog /rtag tu mthon po'i rigs su skye bar
shog /nor dang 'bru'i mdzod rnams 'byor gyur cig /snyan dang grags dang gzugs dang kha dog gis/ /bskal pa du mar legs par brgyan par shog /bud med thams cad rtag tu phor
gyur te/ /dpa' zhing rtul phod mkhas shing gsal bar shog /de kun rtag tu byang chub phyir spyod gyur/ /pha rol phyin pa drug la spyod par shog /phyogs bcu dag na rin chen shing dbang drung / /
sangs rgyas bder bzhugs rin chen bai dU r+ya'i/ /khri la bzhugs pa dag ni mthong gyur cig /chos bstan pa yang de dag thos par shog /bdag gis sdig pa'i las rnams bsgrubs pa ni/ /srid pa
nyam ngar sngon chad gang bsgrubs pa/ /sdig las gang dag mi 'dod 'bras thob pa/ /de dag thams cad ma lus zad gyur cig /sems can gang dag srid par bcings gnas kun/ /'khor
ba'i zhags pa'i thag pas dam bcings pa/ /shes rab lag gis bcings pa bkrol bar shog /sdug bsngal rnams las thar gyur thub gyur cig /sems can gang dag 'dzam bu'i gling 'di dang / /gang dag

'jig rten khams ni gzhan rnams na/ /bsod nams sna tshogs zab mo rnams byed pa/ /de dag kun la rjes su yi rang ngo / /lus dang ngag dang yid gyis bsgrubs pa yis/ /bdag gi rjes su yi rang bsod nams des/ /

bdag gi smon grub 'bras bu yod par shog /byang chub rdul bral bla med thob gyur cig /gang dag rtag tu dri ma bral ba dang / /dri med yid kyis phyag 'tshal bstod pa dang / /yongs su bsngo ba brjod pa 'di yis ni/ /bskal pa
drug bcur ngan song spong bar 'gyur/ /tshigs su bcad pa brjod pa 'di dag gis/ /skyes pa bud med bram ze rgyal rigs las/ /thal sbyar 'dug ste rgyal ba gang bstod pa/ /tshe rabs kun du skye ba dran par

'gyur/ /yan lag dbang po kun gyis yan lag brgyan/ /bsod nams yon tan sna tshogs rnams dang ldan/ /mi dbang rgyal pos rtag tu de mchod de/ /de dang de dag tu ni de 'drar 'gyur/ /gang dag rna ba'i bu gar
bshags pa 'di ni grag gyur pa/ /de dag sangs rgyas gcig gi gan nas dge ba byas ma yin/ /gnyis la ma yin bzhi la ma yin lnga min bcu la min/ /de dag sangs rgyas stong gi gan nas dge ba byas ma yin/ /
'phags pa gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las gsungs pa'i smon lam/ rdzogs s+ho// // @/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di gsungs

so/ /'jig rten 'di 'am yang na 'das pa dang / /mtho ris dag na rin chen mchog yod pa/ /de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i lhar gyur pa/ /mi mchog de dang 'dir ni mtshungs pa med/ /de bas 'dir ni rin chen mchog tu gsungs/ /bden pa

de yis 'dir ni bde legs shog /zad pa chags bral bdud rtsi 'dus ma byas/ /shes pas shAkya thub des rab tu phye/ /bdud rtsi zhi ba 'dus byas ma yin pa/ /chos de dang ni mtshungs pa gang yang med/ /de bas 'dir ni rin chen mchog tu gsungs/ /bden pa

de yis 'dir ni dge bar shog /mchog tu gang 'dod tshul bzhin rab tu bstan/ /ston pa bla med rnal 'byor rtag sgrub pa/ /rdo rje lta bu'i mig gnyis lam mthong ba/ /ting 'dzin de dang mnyam pa yod ma yin/ /de bas 'dir ni rin chen mchog

tu gsungs/ /bden pa de yis 'dir ni dge bar shog /gang zag chen po brgyad po rab bsngags shing / /gang zag zung bzhir brjod pa de dag ni/ /drang srong chen po gang zag mtshungs med pa/ /bde bar gshegs pas

sbyin pa'i gnas shes gsungs/ /de la byin na 'bras bu cher 'gyur te/ /zhing rab gshin las sa bon btab pa bzhin/ /'di ni dge 'dun rin chen mchog tu gsungs/ /bden pa de yis 'dir ni dge bar shog /gang dag brtan pa'i

yid kyis rab brtson zhing / /gau ta ma'i bstan la 'jug byed pa/ /de dag thos nas bdud rtsi mchog thob ste/ /mun pa bsal nas mya ngan 'das thob pa/ /de bas dge 'dun rin chen mchog tu gsungs/ /bden pa de yis 'dir ni

dge bar shog /lta ba 'di la sbyar ma thag tu ni/ /'jig tshogs lta dang tshul khrims brtul zhugs dang / /the tsom dang ni nyon mongs gsum po dag /gcig char spangs te 'phags pa'i bden mthong ba/ /des na dge 'dun rin
chen mchog tu gsungs/ /bden pa de yis 'dir ni dge bar shog /lus sam ngag gam 'on te yid kyis kyang / /sdig pa rnam gsum nam yang mi byed ci nga / /blo bur byas na'ang 'chab par mi byed la/ /de ltar
de la lta bas 'dzin mi byed/ /des na dge 'dun rin chen mchog tu gsungs/ /bden pa de yis 'dir ni dge bar shog /ji ltar dbang po'i sdong po sar btsugs pa/ /phyogs bcu'i rlung rnams kyis ni mi
g.yo ltar/ /'phags pa'i lam gyi dam pa mthong ba yi/ /gang zag 'phags pa'i dge 'dun de bzhin no/ /des na dge 'dun rin chen mchog tu gsungs/ /bden pa de yis 'dir ni dge bar shog /shes
rab zab mos shin tu bstan pa yi/ /'phags pa'i bden pa su dag rnam sgom zhing / /lus kyang sbyin par yid la byas pas ni/ /de dag 'jigs pa brgyad dang phrad mi 'gyur/ /de bas dge 'dun rin chen mchog tu

gsungs/ /bden pa de yis 'dir ni dge bar shog /ji ltar me ni rlung gis rab gtor ba/ /lag tu blangs te bgrang du med pa nyid/ /de ltar kun du sbyor ba rab btang ba'i/ /sangs rgyas sras rnams bstan du med par 'gro/ /des na dge 'dun
rin chen mchog tu gsungs/ /bden pa de yis 'dir ni dge bar shog /sems can gang dag 'gro dang mi 'gro ba/ /de dag thams cad 'dir ni dge bar shog /ston mchog dam pa lha mis mchod 'os pa/ /sangs rgyas
phyag 'tshal ding 'dir bde legs shog /sems can gang dag 'gro dang mi 'gro ba/ /de dag thams cad 'dir ni dge bar shog /zhi ba chags bral lha mis mchod 'os pa/ /chos la phyag 'tshal ding 'dir bde legs
shog /sems can gang dag 'gro dang mi 'gro ba/ /de dag thams cad 'dir ni bder gyur cig /tshogs kyi dam pa lha mis mchod 'os pa/ /dge 'dun phyag 'tshal ding 'dir dge bar shog /'byung po gang dag 'dir
ni lhags gyur de/ /sa 'am 'on te bar snang 'khod pa dag /skye dgu rnams la rtag tu byams byed cing / /nyin dang mtshan du chos kyang spyod par shog /'di ni rgyal ba dgra rgyal bden gang gis/ /shin du
bden pa gsung zhing brdzun med pa/ /bden pa de yis 'dir ni dge bar shog /de kun 'jigs pa che las thar gyur cig /@/ /rdzogs sangs rnam par sangs rgyas tshe/ /

'jig rten skyong bas phyogs bzhi nas/ /snod bzhi dag ni blangs nas su/ /bde bar gshegs la phul ba dang / /mthu yis gcig tu sprul mdzad pa/ /lha'i snod mchog de dang ni/ /bdud rtsi 'dra ba'i sman gyi rnams/ /
ston pa'i phyag na bsnams gyur pa/ /bden pa'i tshig ni de dag gis/ /sman rnams bdud rtsir gyur par shog /de bzhin lha mo 'phrog ma yis/ /lha rdzas dge ba a ru ra/ /blangs nas ston la rab phul ba/ /

bdud rtsi 'dra ba'i sman gyi rnams/ /bden pa'i tshig ni de dag gis/ /nad pa rnams kyis nad sel cing / /nyes pa thams cad 'phrog byed pa/ /sman rnams bdud rtsir gyur par shog /sangs rgyas rnam gzigs gzi

brjid dang / /gtsug tor can gyis stobs rnams dang / /thams cad skyob kyi bden tshig dang / /log dad sel gyi ting 'dzin dang / /gser zhes bya ba'i ye shes dang / /'od srung gi ni rdzu 'phrul dang / /shAkya seng ge'i mthu

rnams kyis/ /sman rnams bdud rtsir gyur par shog /sangs rgyas kun gyi gzi brjid dang / /rang rgyal dag gi gzi brjid dang / /dgra bcom rnams kyi mthu dag dang / /gsang sngags 'dzin pa thams cad dang / /

shA ri'i bu yi shes rab dang / /maud gal bu yi rdzu 'phrul dang / /ma 'gags pa'i mig dang ni/ /'od srung sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang / /kauN+Di n+ya'i sngar thob dang / /kun dga' bo'i thos pa dang / /tshangs pa
yi ni byams pa dang / /brgya byin gyi ni dbang rnams dang / /'jig rten skyong gi yul rnams dang / /dbang phyug chen po'i stobs dag dang / /sde dpon rnams kyi mthu dag dang / /'phrog ma'i gzi brjid
rdzu 'phrul dang / /de dag rnams kyi mthu dang gzis/ /bdag gi dug ni dug med shog /'phags pa stong chen mo rab tu 'joms pa las gsungs pa'i smon lam/ rdzogs s+ho// //
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rgyal ba rnam gzigs mya ngan 'tshang la gnas/ /rgyal ba gtsug tor pad ma dkar po'i drung / /

thams cad skyob pa sa la'i drung na gnas/ /bram ze 'khor ba 'jig ni shir sha'i drung / /sangs rgyas gser thub u dum ba ra'i drung / /'od srung n+ya gro d+ha'i drung na gnas/ /shAkya thub mchog khyad par

gnas drung du/ /phyin nas byang chub thob gyur gau ta ma/ /sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul chen po de dag la/ /mngon par dad pa'i lha gang 'khod pa dag /lha rnams de dag yid dga' mgur gyur nas/ /rtag tu dge zhing zhi bar byos// //
sangs rgyas rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rkang gnyis khyed rnams bde legs shog /rkang bzhi khyed cag bde legs shog /lam du zhugs rnams bde legs shog /phyir 'ong dag kyang bde legs shog /mtshan mo bde
legs nyin bde legs/ /nyi ma'i gung la bde legs shing / /khyed cag kun du bde legs shog /de dag sdig par ma gyur cig /nyi ma thams cad dge ba yin/ /rgyu skar thams cad bzang po yin/ /sangs
rgyas thams cad rdzu 'phrul che/ /dgra bcom thams cad zad pa med/ /bden pa'i tshig gis kun du bde legs su gyur cig /rigs sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo las gsungs pa'i smon lam
dang bden tshig /rdzogs s+ho// // dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang la ser sna rnam chags pa/ /rnam 'joms dri ma med
mdzad pa/ /thugs zhi gnod pa mi mnga' des/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /'dren pa gang zhig 'gro ba rnams/ /thar pa'i lam du 'dzud mdzad cing / /chos rnams thams cad ston pa des/ /khyed la
bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /ston pa 'gro ba rnams kyi rten/ /sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir/ /gang gis bde ba mnga' mdzad des/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur / /skyob pa gang zhig

byams pa yi/ /thugs kyis 'gro ba 'di dag kun/ /bu gcig bzhin du rtag bskyangs des/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /gang zhig 'khor bar 'khor ba yi/ /sems can kun gyi rten gyur cig /gling dang dpung gnyen
gyur pa des/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /gang zhig chos kun mngon sum gyur/ /gtsang zhing slu ba mi mnga' ba/ /gsung gtsang gtsang bar mdzad pa des/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /dpa'

bo chen po gang skyes pa/ /phun sum tshogs don 'byor gyur cing / /don grub tshogs kyang grub pa des/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /gang zhig skyes pas sa rnams dang / /nags tshal bcas pa rab g.yos nas/ /
sems can thams cad rab dga' des/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /byang chub snying por gang zhig gis/ /sa rnams rnam drug g.yor gyur cing / /bdud yid mi bder gyur pa des/ /khyed la bde legs
mdzad par 'gyur/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba na/ /'phags pa'i bden pa gsungs pa gang / /thub pa'i grags pa 'byung ba des/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /yid 'phrog gang gis mu stegs
byed/ /thams cad chos kyis pham mdzad cing / /tshogs kun dbang du mdzad pa des/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas khyed la bde legs mdzad/ /brgya byin lhar bcas bde legs dang / /

'byung po kun gyi bde legs ni/ /khyed la dus kun sbyin gyur cig /sangs rgyas bsod nams mthu dag dang / /lha rnams kyis ni bsams pa yis/ /khyed kyi don 'dod gang yin pa / /don de di ring grub gyur cig /
rkang gnyis khyed cag bde legs shog /rkang bzhi khyed cag bde legs shog /khyed cag lam 'gro bde legs shog /phyir 'ong dag kyang bde legs shog /nyin mo bde legs mtshan bde legs/ /
nyi ma'i gung la'ang bde legs shing / /khyed rnams kun du bde legs shog /khyed cag sdig par ma gyur cig /sangs rgyas lha ni stong rnams kyis/ /yongs su bskor te gshegs

mdzad kyis/ /sdang sems ldan pa rnams byer cig /snying rje'i bdag nyid can rnams 'khod/ /sangs rgyas rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / /dgra bcom slob pa'i bden tshig gis/ /'jig rten mi phan byed pa rnams/ /

grong khyer 'di ni gtong gyur cig /sems can kun dang srog chags kun/ /'byung po kun dang khyed cag kun/ /bde ba 'ba' zhig ldan gyur cig /thams cad nad ni med gyur cig /kun gyis bzang po mthong gyur cig /

gang yang sdig par ma gyur cig /'byung po gang dag 'dir ni lhags gyur cing / /sa 'am 'on te bar snang gnas pa rnams/ /skye dgu rnams la rtag tu byams bgyid cing / /nyin dang mtshan du chos la spyod gyur cig /'dul
ba lung gi cha shas yangs pa'i grong khyer du 'jug pa'i bde legs kyi tshigs su bcad pa/ rdzogs s+ho// // @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ swa sti gA thA/ bod skad du/ bde
legs kyi tshigs su bcad pa/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /lha cig nye bar song nas su/ /lhas mchod pa la zhus byas te/ /sangs rgyas chen po thub pa che/ /ci zhig smras na bde
legs 'gyur/ /des ni tshig de gsan gyur nas/ /'jig rten rtsa lag bka' stsal pa/ /gang zhig rtag tu brjod byed pa/ /nga yi bde legs 'gyur de nyon/ /'jig rten 'di dang gzhan dang mtho ris na/ /

rin chen rgya chen mchog ni gang yod pa/ /des ni rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen la/ /cig kyang grangs dang bgrang dang char mi phod/ /ngo mtshar shin du rmad byung dpag med de/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'jig rten mchog /

ji ltar nga'i 'di de bzhin bden mchog na/ /bden pa 'dis ni shin du bde legs shog /zhi 'gog bdud rtsi shin du gya nom gang / /shAkya thub pas mnyam bzhag thugs chud pa/ /chos de dang ni mtshungs pa yod min te/ /

de mngon byas na phyin chad mya ngan med/ /ngo mtshar shin du rmad byung dpag med de/ /dam pa'i chos kyi rin chen 'jig rten mchog /ji ltar nga'i 'di de bzhin bden mchog na/ /bden pa 'dis ni shin du bde legs

shog /rgyal bas gang dag gang zag brgyad gsungs pa/ /de dag rnams ni skyes bu zung bzhi ste/ /sbyin gnas de dag sa steng shin du dkon/ /de dag rnams la byin na dpag med 'gyur/ /ngo mtshar shin du rmad byung dpag
med de/ /dge 'dun rin chen gang zhig 'jig rten mchog /ji ltar nga'i 'di de bzhin bden mchog na/ /bden pa 'dis ni shin du bde legs shog /dam pa gtso bo mchog sbyin gya nom pa/ /'od mchog dpa'
bo dam pa mchog gi gnas/ /shes rab dam pa mchog gi dam pa mchog /mchog min mchog mkhyen 'di ni bcom ldan gcig /ngo mtshar shin du rmad byung dpag med de/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'jig rten

mchog /ji ltar nga'i 'di de bzhin bden mchog na/ /bden pa 'dis ni shin du bde legs shog /ting 'dzin dam pa bar chad med pa gang / /mtha' yas blo ldan de bzhin gshegs gsungs pa/ /ting 'dzin de bstan rdo rje

dper byas pa/ /ting 'dzin de dang mtshungs pa'i ting 'dzin med/ /ngo mtshar shin du rmad byung dpag med de/ /ting nge 'dzin gyi rin chen 'jig rten mchog /ji ltar nga'i 'di de bzhin bden mchog na/ /bden pa

'dis ni shin du bde legs shog /ji ltar sgo gtan dam zhing rab dam ste/ /stobs chen rlung bzhi dag gis mi bskyod pa/ /de ltar mkhas pa bden bzhi mthong gnas pa/ /'jig rten smra ba rnams kyis 'dir mi g.yo/ /

ngo mtshar shin du rmad byung dpag med de/ /dge 'dun rin chen gang zhig 'jig rten mchog /ji ltar nga'i 'di de bzhin bden mchog na/ /bden pa 'dis ni shin du bde legs shog /thams cad zil gnon kun mkhyen thams cad gzigs/ /

thams cad mkhyen pa stobs rnams kun dang ldan/ /kun gyi dam pa 'dzin pa kun dang bral/ /bsam pa kun mkhyen 'di ni bcom ldan cig /ngo mtshar shin du rmad byung dpag med de/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'jig rten

mchog /ji ltar nga'i 'di de bzhin bden mchog na/ /bden pa 'dis ni shin du bde legs shog /srid pa 'gog cing mi g.yo 'gyur ba med/ /skyon med 'jigs pa kun las rnam par grol/ /shin du 'gag cing gya nom nges par 'byung / /

shin du dri med zhi ba blos mi 'phrogs/ /ngo mtshar shin du rmad byung dpag med de/ /dam pa'i chos kyi rin chen 'jig rten mchog /ji ltar nga'i 'di de bzhin bden mchog na/ /bden pa 'dis ni shin du bde legs shog /shin

du sdug bsngal ston cing bde sbyin pa'i/ /bden rnams mthong ste gang dag bag yod pa/ /bden pa rin chen rnams la dogs bral ba/ /de dag skye ba brgyad pa phyis mi len/ /ngo mtshar shin du rmad byung dpag med de/ /
dge 'dun rin chen gang zhig 'jig rten mchog /ji ltar nga'i 'di de bzhin bden mchog na/ /bden pa 'dis ni shin du bde legs shog /dam pa rnams kyis dam pa don dam mkhyen/ /mchog dang mchog min
mkhyen cing don dam brtson/ /gzhan gyis mi 'phrogs dam pa thugs chud rtogs/ /shin du sdug bsngal rnams kyi dpung gnyen mchog /ngo mtshar shin du rmad byung dpag med de/ /rdzogs pa'i
sangs rgyas rin chen 'jig rten mchog /ji ltar nga'i 'di de bzhin bden mchog na/ /bden pa 'dis ni shin du bde legs shog /'dun pa bskyed nas rnal 'byor ldan gyur cing / /gau tam
bstan la rtag brtson rab grol zhi/ /gzhan gyis mi bkri ba dag zhi der reg /'di la de reg grangs su phyin mi 'gyur/ /ngo mtshar shin du rmad byung dpag med de/ /dge 'dun rin chen gang zhig
'jig rten mchog /ji ltar nga'i 'di de bzhin bden mchog na/ /bden pa 'dis ni shin du bde legs shog /bden pa mthong bas brjed pas brgya lam na/ /gal te sdig pa 'ga' zhig byas gyur kyang / /de ni de

'chal ba'i 'os min te/ /chos nyid 'di ni mi g.yo gnas phyir ro/ /ngo mtshar shin du rmad byung dpag med de/ /dge 'dun rin chen gang zhig 'jig rten mchog /ji ltar nga'i 'di de bzhin bden mchog na/ /bden pa 'dis

ni shin du bde legs shog /lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten thams cad na/ /sangs rgyas dang ni lhag pa 'am mtshungs pa med/ /lha dang mi yi ston pa bla na med/ /ston pa ded dpon sman pa rnams kyi mchog /ngo mtshar

shin du rmad byung dpag med de/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'jig rten mchog /ji ltar nga'i 'di de bzhin bden mchog na/ /bden pa 'dis ni shin du bde legs shog /so ga'i zla ba dang por thub pa yis/ /

nags khrod chos kyi dam pa rab brnyes pa/ /chos de dang ni lhag pa 'am mtshungs pa med/ /'di la de rig grangs su phyin mi 'gyur/ /ngo mtshar shin du rmad byung dpag med de/ /dam pa'i chos kyi rin chen 'jig rten
mchog /ji ltar nga'i 'di de bzhin bden mchog na/ /bden pa 'dis ni shin du bde legs shog /sdig pa rnying zad gsar du byas med na/ /rims nad med pas 'jigs med mya ngan bral/ /srid pa 'gags
pas rtsa ba mi bskyed pa/ /bstan pa mar me bzhin du 'bar bar 'gyur/ /ngo mtshar shin du rmad byung dpag med de/ /dge 'dun rin chen gang zhig 'jig rten mchog /ji ltar nga'i 'di de bzhin
bden mchog na/ /bden pa 'dis ni shin du bde legs shog /bde legs kyi tshigs su bcad pa/ rdzogs s+ho// //
@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ swa s+t+ya ya gA thA/ bod skad du/ bde legs su 'gyur ba'i tshigs su bcad pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'jig rten 'dren pa'i drung du ni/ /lha zhig nye

bar song nas su/ /gang gis rtag tu bde legs pa/ /bdag gis zhu yis bcom ldan gsungs/ /dam pas de dag gsan pa dang / /'jig rten 'dren pas lung bstan pa/ /gang gis kun du bde legs su/ /'gyur ba lha khyod

legs par nyon/ /gang zhig de bzhin gshegs pa la/ /dad pa mi g.yo legs rab bstan/ /gang zhig dge ba tshul khrims can/ /de dag kun du bde legs 'gyur/ /gang zhig pha dang ma dag dang / /bu dang bu mo bran dag la/ /
rtag tu legs par bsnyen bkur ba/ /de dag kun du bde legs 'gyur/ /gang zhig dgra bcom grags pa la/ /legs par rab dang yon 'bul dang / /lha yi bka' bzhin byed pa dag /de dag kun du bde legs 'gyur/ /

gang gis lus dang ngag dang ni/ /yid la nyes byas med pa dang / /gang zhig rnam gsum rab bsdams pa/ /de dag kun du bde legs 'gyur/ /gang zhig 'byung po thams cad la/ /tshad med kun du mi 'khrugs pa/ /
byams pa'i sems ni sgom byed pa/ /de dag kun du bde legs 'gyur/ /gang zhig sdug bsngal kun spang phyir/ /'phags pa'i lam gyi yan lag brgyad/ /bde ba 'dren pa legs sgom pa/ /de dag kun du bde legs
'gyur/ /gang gis 'dus byas thams cad kyi/ /stong nyid rtag tu legs mthong zhing / /de ni sems la gnas gyur pa/ /de dag kun du bde legs 'gyur/ /gang gis lus kyis dri med chos/ /mngon sum byas

nas rgyu ba dang / /dgra bcom rnam grol sems ldan pa/ /de dag kun du bde legs 'gyur/ /gang gis 'dod chags zhe sdang dang / /gti mug rnams dang chags bral zhing / /ye shes 'khrug med skyes gyur pa/ /de dag kun du bde legs 'gyur/ /gang zhig lhar
bcas 'jig rten gyi/ /mgon po yang srid spangs pa yi/ /sangs rgyas khong du chud gyur pa/ /de dag kun du bde legs 'gyur/ /bde legs su 'gyur ba'i tshigs su bcad pa/ rdzogs s+ho// //

shis par brjod pa'i tshigs su bcad pa/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /lha yi bkra shis don sgrub cing / /phyogs rnams bkra shis byed pa des/ /khyed kyi don rnams grub gyur cig /thams cad myur du 'thun
par shog /phreng ba mgo la 'dug pa ltar/ /lag pa g.yas na dpal yod shog /g.yon na'ang dpal ni gnas gyur cig /yan lag kun na'ang dpal yod shog /tshong pa dag ni nor tshol zhing / /phyogs bcu dag tu

'gro ba rnams/ /rnyed pa chen po rnyed gyur cing / /de dag bde ba skyid par shog /dgos pa la la gang gi phyir/ /shar phyogs su ni 'gro ba na/ /gang dag phyogs der gnas pa yi/ /rgyu skar khyed la skyong gyur cig /smin

drug dang ni snar ma dang / /mgo dang lag dang nam so dang / /rgyal dang skag ces bya ba ste/ /de dag rnams ni shar phyogs pa/ /rgyu skar bdun po de dag ni/ /'jig rten skyong ba grags ldan pa/ /shar phyogs logs na

yod ces bstan/ /de dag khyed la kun du bsrungs/ /de dag bdag po rgyal po ni/ /yul 'khor bsrung zhes grags pa ste/ /de ni dri za kun gyi bdag /nyi ma lhan cig bsrung bar shog /de la bu ni mang yod pa/ /

mkhas shing ming yang 'thun pa ste/ /dgu bcu rtsa gcig zad par yang / /dbang po zhes bya stobs po che/ /de rnams khyed la nad med cing / /shis par lhag par skyong gyur cig /shar phyogs logs kyi phyogs cha na/ /

lha mo gzhon nu brgyad yod de/ /rgyal dang rnam par rgyal ma dang / /don grub ma dang mi pham dang / /dga' mchog ma dang dga' sde dang / /dga' can ma dang dga' 'phel ma/ /de dag khyed la nad med cing / /shis par lhag par skyong bar shog /shar

phyogs logs kyi phyogs cha na/ /gzhi 'dzin ces bya'i mchod rten yod/ /rgyal ba skyob pa dgra bcom pa/ /de rnams kyis ni bzhugs shing mkhyen/ /de yang khyed la nad med cing / /shis par lhag par skyong gyur cig /phyogs

na khyed cag bde bar shog /khyed cag sdig par ma gyur cig /lha rnams kun gyis rab bsrungs nas/ /nor rnams rnyed de ldog par shog /dgos pa la la gang gi phyir/ /lho phyogs su ni 'gro ba na/ /gang dag phyogs der

gnas pa yi/ /rgyu skar khyed la skyong gyur cig /mchu dang gre dang dbo dang ni/ /me bzhi nag pa lnga pa yin/ /sa ri dang ni sa ga ste/ /de dag rnams ni lho phyogs pa/ /rgyu skar bdun po de dag ni/ /'jig rten skyong ba grags ldan pa/ /lho phyogs

logs na yod ces bstan/ /de dag khyed la kun du bsrungs/ /de dag bdag po rgyal po ni/ /'phags skyes po zhes bya bar brjod/ /de ni grul bum kun gyi bdag /gshin rje lhan cig bsrung bar shog /de la bu ni mang yod la/ /

mkhas shing ming yang 'thun pa ste/ /dgu bcu rtsa gcig zad par yang / /dbang po zhes bya stobs po che/ /de rnams khyed la nad med cing / /shis par lhag par skyong gyur cig /lho phyogs logs kyi phyogs cha na/ /lha mo

gzhon nu brgyad yod de/ /dpal ldan ma dang grags ldan ma/ /grags pa thob dang grags 'dzin dang / /legs par langs dang rab ldang dang / /legs par sad dang bde sgrub ma/ /de dag khyed la nad med cing / /

shis par lhag par skyong bar shog /lho phyogs logs kyi phyogs cha na/ /pad ma zhes bya'i mchod rten yod/ /rtag tu gzi brjid kyis kyang 'bar/ /rtag tu thams cad gsal byed pa/ /de yang khyed la nad med cing / /shis

par lhag par skyong gyur cig /phyogs na khyed cag bde bar shog /khyed cag sdig par ma gyur cig /lha rnams kun gyis rab bsrungs nas/ /nor rnams rnyed de ldog par shog /dgos pa la la gang gi phyir/ /nub phyogs su ni 'gro ba na/ /gang dag phyogs

der gnas pa yis/ /rgyu skar khyer la skyong gyur cig /lha mtshams dang ni snron dang yang / /brtson 'grus brtan ldan snrums dang ni/ /chu stod chu smad byi zhin dang / /gro zhin de ni bdun pa yin/ /rgyu skar bdun po de dag ni/ /

'jig rten skyong ba grags ldan/ /nub phyogs logs na yod ces bstan/ /de dag khyed la kun du bsrungs/ /de dag bdag po rgyal po ni/ /mig mi bzang zhes bya bar shes/ /de ni klu rnams kun gyi bdag /chu lha lhan cig bsrung bar

shog /de la bu ni mang yod la/ /mkhas shing ming yang 'thun pa ste/ /dgu bcu rtsa gcig zad par yang / /dbang po zhes bya stobs po che/ /de dag khyed la nad med cing / /shis par lhag par skyong gyur cig /nub phyogs

logs kyi phyogs cha na/ /lha mo gzhon nu brgyad yod de/ /rna cha skra 'dres ma dang ni/ /pad ma dkar dang skya reng dang / /cha med gcig dang dgu pa dang / /rol dang gnag dang stabs myur srid/ /de dag khyed la nad med cing / /

shis par lhag par skyong bar shog /nub phyogs logs kyi phyogs cha na/ /nub ces bya ba'i ri bo yod / /nyi ma zla ba gnyis ka'ang nub/ /nub pa'ang khyed la nor sbyin 'gyur/ /de yang khyed la nad med cing / /
shis par lhag par skyong gyur cig /phyogs na khyed cag bde bar shog /khyed cag sdig par ma gyur cig /lha rnams kun gyis rab bsrungs nas/ /nor rnams rnyed de ldog par shog /dgos pa la

la gang gi phyir/ /byang phyogs su ni 'gro ba na/ /gang dag phyogs der gnas pa yi/ /rgyu skar khyed la skyong gyur cig /mon gru dang ni mon gre dang / /khrums stod dang ni khrums smad da dang / /nam gru dang ni
tha skar dang / /bra nye ste ni bdun pa yin/ /rgyu skar bdun po de dag ni/ /'jig rten skyong ba grags ldan pa/ /byang phyogs logs na yod ces bstan/ /de dag khyed la kun du bsrungs/ /de dag bdag

po rgyal po ni/ /mi la zhon pa lus ngan po/ /gnod sbyin kun gyi bdag po ste/ /nor bzangs lhan cig bsrung bar shog /de la bu ni mang yod la/ /mkhas shing ming yang 'thun pa ste/ /dgu bcu rtsa gcig zad par yang / /

dbang po zhes bya stobs po che/ /de dag khyed la nad med ci nga / /shis par lhag par skyong gyur cig /byang phyogs logs kyi phyogs cha na/ /lha mo gzhon nu brgyad yod de/ /rab chags lha mo gtong lha mo/ /sa dang de bzhin

pad ma can/ /rgyal po che la nyer gnas dang / /de dang khrel yod dpal ldan ma/ /de dag khyed la nad med cing / /shis par lhag par skyong bar shog /byang phyogs logs kyi phyogs cha na/ /spos ngad ldang ba'i ri
bo yod/ /gnod sbyin 'byung po rnams kyi gnas/ /rtse mo sna tshogs blta na sdug /de yang khyed la nad med cing / /shis par lhag par skyong gyur cig /phyogs na khyed cag bde bar shog /khyed cag sdig
par ma gyur cig /lha rnams kun gyis rab bsrungs nas/ /nor rnams rnyed de ldog par shog /rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad po/ /phyogs bzhi dag na bdun bdun gnas/ /lha yi bu mo sum bcu gnyis/ /
phyogs bzhi dag na brgyad brgyad gnas/ /dge sbyong brgyad dang bram ze brgyad/ /yul rnams na ni grong rdal brgyad/ /dbang por bcas pa'i lha brgyad rnams/ /de dag khyed la kun du bsrungs/ /khyed cag

'gro na'ang bkra shis gyur/ /ldog pa na yang bkra shis shog /gnyen la lta ba bkra shis shog /gnyen gyi lta ba'ang bkra shis shog /dbang bcas gnod sbyin rgyal che dang / /dgra bcom pa dag snying brtse bas/ /thams cad

du ni bkra shis dang / /bdud rtsi shis pa thob par shog /tshangs pa dang ni de bzhin nor rgyas dang / /zag pa med pa rnam par grol rnams dang / /klu dang gnod sbyin rtag tu snying rjes bsrungs/ /ston brgya mtshungs par tshe ni skyong bar shog /
'phags pa rgya cher rol pa'i mdo'i tshong dpon ga gon dang bzang po'i le'u las/ 'byung ba shis par brjod pa'i tshigs su bcad pa/ rdzogs s+ho// //
@/ /rgya gar skad du/ rad na tri swa sti ma~M ga la~M gA thA/ bod skad du/ dkon mchog gsum gyi bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /che ba'i che mchog
ston mchog bla na med/ /chos rje nyi ma rgyal ba'i byin rlabs kyis/ /bdud dang bgegs rigs gnod pa'i dgra zhi ste/ /rtag tu dpal gnas nyin mtshan bkra shis shog /chos nyid bden pa'i chos
mchog bla na med/ /dam chos bdud rtsi bden pa'i byin rlabs kyis/ /nyes pa'i skyon bral dge tshogs rnam 'phel ba/ /rtag tu dpal gnas nyin mtshan bkra shis shog /dge 'dun yon tan rin chen
dpal 'bar ba/ /rgyal sras phan mdzad bden pa'i byin rlabs kyis/ /nyon mongs sdug bsngal gdung ba'i dgra zhi ste/ /rtag tu dpal gnas nyin mtshan bkra shis shog /tshangs dang lha dbang bsrungs
ma'i byin brlabs kyis/ /phan mdzad lha yi bkra shis gnas gyur te/ /bde legs bsam pa yid bzhin 'grub pa dang / /che ring nad med bde skyid ldan par shog /dkon mchog gsum gyi bkra

shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag des pa la gsungs pa/ rdzogs s+ho// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po 'dzi na mi tra dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la
phab pa'o/ / dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis/ /thugs rje chen po mnga' ba 'od srung rigs skyes pa/ /rnam par rgyal bar gshegs gyur pa/ /

des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig /bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis/ /gser thub bsgribs pa med par rab tu gzigs pa de/ /rin chen sna tshogs gshegs gyur pa/ /des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig /bkra

shis dam pa gang zhig gis/ /gsod skyabs gser gyi ri bo 'bar ba 'dra ba de/ /rtse mo mchog tu gshegs gyur pa/ /des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig /bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis/ /thams cad mnga' ba
dgra bcom dri ma gsum sel ba/ /mdzod spu'i rtse mor gshegs gyur pa/ /des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig /bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis/ /sangs rgyas gtsug tor dgongs pa zil gyis mi non pa/ /
rin chen sna tshogs gshegs gyur pa/ /des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig /bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis/ /rnam par gzigs pa skyes bu'i zla ba mi yi mgon/ /rin chen rgyan du gshegs gyur
pa/ /des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig /bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis/ /shin du rgyas pa don dam mkhas shing brtan pa de/ /ma la ya yi rtser gshegs pa/ /
des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig /bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis/ /sangs rgyas ston mchog thogs pa mi mnga' ba/ /dri med zla bar gshegs gyur pa/ /des ni 'dir yang bkra
shis legs gyur cig /bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis/ /grags pa dri ma med par mgon po pad ma'i bla/ /dri ma med par gshegs gyur pa/ /des ni 'dir yang bkra shis
legs gyur cig /bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis/ /mgon po mar me mdzad pa 'od snang mnga' ba de/ /'od zer dra bar gshegs gyur pa/ /des ni 'dir yang bkra shis
