legs gyur cig /bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bkra shis tshigs su bcad pa'o// // dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bkra
shis dam pa gang zhig gis/ /sangs rgyas grags pa'i dam par mtshan btags pa/ /nor bu'i gtsug tu gshegs pa ltar/ /des ni 'dir yang bkra shis mchog gyur cig /bkra shis dam pa gang
zhig gis/ /'jig rten sgron ma blo zhes mtshan btags pa/ /sbyangs pa'i lam du gshegs pa ltar/ /des ni 'dir yang bkra shis mchog gyur cig /bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis/ /sgribs
med gzigs pa 'dzum pa'i spyan du mtshan btags pa/ /brgyan gcig ldan par gshegs pa ltar/ /des ni 'dir yang bkra shis mchog gyur cig /bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis/ /'jig rten
sgron ma mar me mdzad ces mtshan btags pa/ /rnam par rgyal bar gshegs pa ltar/ /des ni 'dir yang bkra shis mchog gyur cig /bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis/ /bde gshegs
yang dag don gzigs pa zhes mtshan btags pa/ /dri med rtse mor gshegs pa ltar/ /des ni 'dir yang bkra shis mchog gyur cig /bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis/ /de bzhin gshegs
pa rang byung mchog ces mtshan btags pa/ /rin chen spos su gshegs pa ltar/ /des ni 'dir yang bkra shis mchog gyur cig /bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis/ /'jig rten sgron ma dbyig
gi lha zhes mtshan btags pa/ /dri med sna tshogs gshegs pa ltar/ /des ni 'dir yang bkra shis mchog gyur cig /bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis/ /'gro ba med pa smra ba'i stag ces mtshan btags pa/ /
thams cad tshal du gshegs pa ltar/ /des ni 'dir yang bkra shis mchog gyur cig /bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis/ /yon tan kun mnga' dpal gyi rgyal bar mtshan btags pa/ /dga' ba'i rgyan du gshegs pa
ltar/ /des ni 'dir yang bkra shis mchog gyur cig /bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis/ /'jig rten phan brtson dka' thub drag por mtshan btags pa/ /kun nas mchog tu gshegs pa ltar/ /des ni 'dir
yang bkra shis mchog gyur cig /ces bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das la lha'i rgyal po rab mtshe mas bkra shis tshigs su bcad pa'o/ / dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bkra
shis dam pa gang zhig gis/ /chags pa med pa'i zla bar mtshan gsol mtshan btags pa/ /pho brang mchog tu rab gshegs pa/ /des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig /bkra shis dam pa gang
zhig gis/ /ye shes mtha' yas dbang zhes bya bar mtshan btags pa/ /kha dog gser du rab gshegs pa/ /des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig /bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis/ /
kun du mtha' yas spyan zhes bya bar mtshan btags pa/ /pad ma'i rtse mor rab gshegs pa/ /des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig /bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis/ /yan lag rin
po che zhes bya bar mtshan btags pa/ /rin chen mdzod du rab gshegs pa/ /des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig /bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis/ /dpal rab rgol ba'i stag
ces bya bar mtshan btags pa/ /dbang po'i khang par rab gshegs pa/ /des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig /
bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis/ /yon tan thams cad ston pa'i nyi mar mtshan btags pa/ /me tog snying por rab gshegs pa/ /des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig /bkra shis dam pa gang
zhig gis/ /yan lag 'od zer mtha' yas par ni mtshan btags pa/ /shing gis brgyan par rab gshegs pa/ /des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig /bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis/ /mgon

po the tsom 'joms pa chos kyi rgyal mtshan de/ /rin chen khang par rab gshegs pa/ /des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig /bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis/ /mi yi seng ge ye shes sgron ma mtha' yas pa/ /
spos kyi rtse mor rab gshegs pa/ /des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig /bkra shis dam pa gang zhig gis/ /sangs rgyas yon tan kun gyis 'byung gnas 'od mnga' ba/ /nor bus brgyan par rab
gshegs pa/ /des ni 'dir yang bkra shis legs gyur cig /bcom ldan 'das la lha'i rgyal po rab dga' ldan gyis bkra shis tshigs su bcad pa/ rdzogs s+ho// //
de ltar lha'i dbang po brgya byin la sogs pa gsum gyis bkra shis tshigs su bcad pa 'di rnams ni shin du rgyas pa chen po'i sde sangs rgyas phal po che las gsungs pa'o/ / @/ /rgya gar skad
du/ de ba pa ri pr-its+tsha maM ga la gA thA/ bod skad du/ lhas zhus pa'i bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gzhan gyis mi thub rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /
mgon po phyogs cig bzhugs pa na/ /lha cig dpa' bo chen po la/ /phyag 'tshal 'di skad tshig gsol to/ /dge ba don du gnyer ba na/ /lha dang mi rnams so so

nas/ /bkra shis dag ni brjod bgyis na/ /bkra shis dam pa gang zhig lags/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /dge ba don du gnyer ba na/ /lha dang mi rnams so so nas/ /bkra shis rnams ni brjod byed pa/ /
de dag bkra shis brjod par bya/ /yul bzang gnas dang grogs mchog dang / /sngon chad bsod nams byas pa dang / /sems ni legs par gtad byas pa/ /de ni bkra shis dam pa yin/ /sbyin dang shin du
snyan smra dang / /yang dag don la rnam nges dang / /khrims ldan rnams dang mtshungs sbyor ba/ /de ni bkra shis dam pa yin/ /byis pa rnams la mi brten dang / /mkhas pa rnams la brten pa dang / /

mchod 'os rnams la mchod byed pa/ /de ni bkra shis dam pa yin/ /pha ma bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / /zhi dang tshangs par spyod pa dang / /'byung po kun la snying brtse ba/ /de ni bkra shis dam pa yin/ /

sdig pa'i las las ldog pa dang / /dge ba'i las la brten pa dang / /bag yod pa dang rtag mkhas pa/ /de ni bkra shis dam pa yin/ /nga rgyal med dang khengs med dang / /chos shes 'thun pas 'tsho ba dang / /
rtag tu byas pa gzo byed pa/ /de ni bkra shis dam pa yin/ /mi smod de bzhin bzod pa dang / /'phags pa rnams dang 'thun sbyor dang / /dus skabs su ni chos nyan pa/ /de ni bkra shis dam pa yin/ /
le lo med dang mang thos dang / /chos la legs par rnam nges dang / /de bzhin sems la rnyog med pa/ /de ni bkra shis dam pa yin / /gang zhig sems can thams cad la/ /byams pa'i sems ni rab
sgom zhing / /dpag tu med de mi 'khrugs pa/ /de ni bkra shis dam pa yin/ /gang zhig 'phags pa'i bden rnams la/ /shes rab mig ni rnam sbyangs dang / /tshul khrims nongs par

ma gyur pa/ /de ni bkra shis dam pa yin/ /'phags pa'i bden pa mthong ba dang / /tshangs par spyod pa sgom pa dang / /mya ngan 'das pa 'thob 'gyur ba/ /de ni bkra shis dam pa yin/ /gang zhig 'dod chags

zhe sdang dang / /ma rig pa yang rnam spangs dang / /shes pa mi 'khrugs skye 'gyur ba/ /de ni bkra shis dam pa yin/ /'jig rten chos rnams kyis bskyod kyang / /gang gi sems ni mi g.yo dang / /dri med zhi dang
mya ngan med/ /de ni bkra shis dam pa yin/ /de dang 'di ni ci rigs par/ /'di la bkra shis de dag ni/ /mkhas pa gang zhig bstod byed pa/ /de la rtag tu bkra shis 'gyur/ /lhas zhus pa'i bkra
\u0f72sa kyi tshigs su bcad pa/ rdzogs s+ho// // @/ /dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan rnam par gzigs ni rgyal rigs gzi brjid can/ /tshe lo brgyad khri'i
dus na grong khyer mdzes ldan du/ /shi ri sha yi shing drung mngon par sangs rgyas pa/ /deng 'dir bde gshegs bkra shis phun sum tshogs gyur cig /bde gshegs gtsug tor mnga' ba rgyal rigs rdzu 'phrul
can/ /tshe lo bdun khri'i dus na su ka'i grong khyer du/ /shing mchog sun d+ha'i shing drung mngon par sangs rgyas pa/ /ding 'dir bde gshegs bkra shis phun sum tshogs gyur cig /rgyal ba
thams cad skyob pa rgyal rigs blo gros can/ /tshe lo drug khri'i dus na grong khyer mnyam med du/ /shing mchog sA la'i drung du mngon par sangs rgyas pa/ /ding 'dir bde gshegs bkra shis phun sum
tshogs gyur cig /thub pa 'khor ba 'jig ni bcom ldan bram ze'i rigs/ /tshe lo bzhi khri'i dus na grong khyer mdzes ldan du/ /shi ri sha yi shing drung mngon par sangs rgyas pa/ /ding 'dir bde

gshegs bkra shis phun sum tshogs gyur cig /'dren pa gser thub bslab pa mchog ldan bram ze'i rigs/ /tshe lo sum khri'i dus na grong khyer bde ldan du/ /u dum ba ra'i shing drung mngon par sangs rgyas pa/ /ding 'dir

bde gshegs bkra shis phun sum tshogs gyur cig /skyob pa 'od srung rgyal rigs bla med yon tan can/ /tshe lo nyi khri'i dus na bA rA Na sI ru/ /n+ya gro d+ha yi shing drung mngon par sangs rgyas pa/ /ding 'dir bde

gshegs bkra shis phun sum tshogs gyur cig /'gro mgon shAkya thub pa rgyal rigs brtson 'grus can/ /tshe lo brgya pa'i dus na ser skya'i grong khyer du/ /a shwa tha yi shing drung mngon par sangs rgyas pa/ /
ding 'dir bde gshegs bkra shis phun sum tshogs gyur cig /sangs rgyas rabs bdun bkra shis phun sum tshogs pa gang / /phyogs dus kun gyi bde gshegs byin rlabs rmad byung ba/ /
chos dbyings rnam dag rten 'brel stobs ldan mi 'gyur ba/ /ding 'dir bde gshegs bkra shis phun sum tshogs gyur cig /sangs rgyas rabs bdun gyi bkra shis tshigs su bcad pa/
rdzogs s+ho// // @#/ /rgya gar skad da du/ ma~M ga la gA thA/ bod skad du/ bkra shis tshigs su bcad pa/ dkon mchog
gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /phun sum tshogs pa mnga' ba gser gyi ri bo 'dra/ /'jig rten gsum gyi mgon po dri ma gsum spangs pa/ /
sangs rgyas pad ma rgyas pa'i mdab 'dra'i spyan mnga' ba/ /bkra shis des ni skye dgu zhi byed dang po'o/ /de yis nye bar bstan pa'i mchog rab mi g.yo ba/ /'jig rten gsum na
grags shing lha dang mis mchod pa/ /chos kyi dam pa skye dgu rnams la zhi byed pa/ /de ni 'jig rten dge ba'i bkra shis gnyis pa'o/ /dge 'dun dam pa'i chos ldan thos pa'i bkra shis phyug /mi dang

lha dang lha ma yin gyis mchod pa'i gnas/ /tshogs kyi mchog rab ngo tsha shes dang dpal gyi gzhi/ /de ni 'jig rten dge ba'i bkra shis gsum pa'o/ /sems can kun la phan phyir byang chub mnga' ba po/ /don rnams

thams cad 'grub par brtul ba yongs ldan pa/ /tshogs kyi lam dgyes thub pa'i bkra shis gang byung ba/ /bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog /'gro la phan phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dga' ldan lha'i/ /

gzhal med khang gi snying po nas ni 'di gshegs te/ /dbang bcas lha yis bskor ba'i bkra shis gang byung ba/ /bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog /lo ma me tog 'od 'bar nyams dga' lum bi'i tshal/ /
lha mang dag gis bsten par mgon po bltam pa na/ /srid pa'i mthar phyin pa yi bkra shis gang byung ba/ /bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog /grong khyer ser skya'i gnas nas rgyal po'i pho
brang du/ /lhums nas bltam pa ston pa bde gshegs zas gtsang sras/ /myur bskrun bdud rtsi'i chus gtor ba yi bkra shis gang / /bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed
shog /grong khyer dam pa ser skya'i gnas zhes bya bar ni/ /rmad du grags pa che ba'i lha yis mngon bstod pa/ /bsam yas dge bsgrubs bsod nams phung po'i bkra shis gang / /
bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog /dgyes shing nam phyed grong khyer mchog nas mngon byung ste/ /dka' thub tshal du mngon par gshegs shing tshangs la sogs/ /

lha'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba'i bkra shis pa/ /bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog /rab tu 'od 'bar gser dang 'dra ba'i sku mnga' zhing / /bai dUr+ya ltar sngo ba'i rtswa bting steng

bzhugs te/ /dkyil mo dkrung bcas mi g.yo mchog gi bkra shis gang / /bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog /chu bo'i 'gram na tsa sha'i phreng gis yongs bskor ba/ /shin du rmad du byung ba'i srid pa sel

mdzad pa/ /klu yi rgyal pos phyag byas pa yi bkra shis gang / /bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog /shing rgyal drung gshegs byams pa'i stobs kyis bdud kyi phyogs/ /mang po btul te sa steng dang ni nam

mkha' la/ /bcom ldan bkra shis rnam pa sna tshogs gang byung ba/ /bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog /sdug bsngal mtha' dag gzhig phyir rdo rje'i gdan bzhugs te/ /nam gyi tho rangs bdud bzhi po dag rnam btul ba/ /

ston pa bde bar gshegs pa'i bkra shis gang yin pa/ /bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog /grong khyer bA rA Na sIr drang srong mchog bzhugs te/ /chos kyi 'khor lo mchog bstan pa yi bkra shis gang / /lha
yul deng 'dir shin du rmad du byung gyur pa/ /bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog /bkra shis gang zhig phan byed dam pa dag byed pa/ /bsod nams bya byed 'phags pa'i skye bos mngon
bstod pa/ /bcom ldan shAkya thub pa'i seng ges gang gsungs pa/ /bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog /mu stegs byed pa kun gyi nga rgyal gzhom pa dang / /'gro la bde ba

bskyed phyir cho 'phrul dam pa dag /nye bar ston pa rgyal ba'i bkra shis gang yin pa/ /bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog /'gro la phan phyir mtho ris nas ni 'dir gshegs te/ /tshangs pa las
sogs lha tshogs lag na rnga yab gdugs/ /sna tshogs thogs pas yongs su bskor ba'i bkra shis gang / /bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog /de bzhin gshegs pa zhi ba mchog tu nyer

gshegs pa/ /man dA ra ba'i me tog mang pos mngon mchod pa/ /lha mchog rnams kyis mngon par bstod pa'i bkra shis gang / /bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog /lha dbang klu dang mi yi dbang pos
phyag byas pa/ /mkha' lding gnod sbyin dri za'i dbang pos mchod gyur pa/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ldan pa'i bkra shis gang / /bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog /dkon mchog
gsum dang mdzad pa bcu gnyis kyi bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa/ rdzogs s+ho// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban d+he ye
shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// //
